Resumen de la empresa:
From the first spark of inspiration to the final moment of production, Group-IPS supports the projects that change lives. We employ project-management prowess and multidisciplinary expertise to help businesses build a foundation for a better world.
In 1992, 26-year-old Luc Tasiaux, then an employee of a major technology company, saw first-hand the consequences of insufficient project preparation and coordination. He founded IPS to help businesses better manage their industrial projects, streamlining the path to success for companies with big ambitions.
Over the course of more than 25 years, we’ve been able to realize Luc’s vision on an increasingly grand scale, growing to 12 countries on 4 continents and counting. With expert project management and engineering – including a wide range of additional services – we provide the comprehensive support that gives companies the freedom to focus on their strengths. Our work spans industries, helping to put planes in the air, cars on the road, medicine in hospitals, products on shelves, and breakfast on your family table.
Today, IPS boasts an international team of driven, entrepreneurial individuals who share the company’s mission to brighten the lives of real people. Group-IPS’s ingenious methodology provides the entire team with a common language to maximize customers’ time and investments. Our success stories include projects for Procter & Gamble, IKEA, Novartis, Shell, AB Inbev, and many others.
The IPS family continues to grow,  and we’re always eager to join forces with businesses that share our values. If your company strives to move into the future with greater confidence, let IPS be your partner for the road ahead.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Life Sciences, EPCM, Industrial and Manufacturing Engineering, Primary and Metals, Chemicals, Food & Beverages, Buildings, Data Centers, Digital Supply Chain & Operations, Consulting, Architecture, Engineering, Safety y Technological Innovation

Resumen de la empresa:

Founded in 1987, Bax & Company creates and manages cutting-edge science and technology initiatives that bring about large-scale societal, environmental and economic impact.  

We are one of leading innovation consultancy firms in Europe, dedicated to defining and facilitating open innovation strategies for large industrial corporations as well as smaller high-tech companies, research institutes and governments. 

We are trusted by many of the top 500 European R&D investors in the industry, tech startups/SMEs, respected scientific and applied researchers, pioneering policy makers and other innovation agents.

Our multi-disciplinary teams propose solutions divided into focus areas:

- Electric vehicles and future mobility
- Smart cities and open data

Resumen de la empresa:
Localizamos, actualizamos e implantamos el contenido digital multilingüe de las marcas más importantes del mundo.

Datawords ha desarrollado un saber hacer y una maestría únicos en la adaptación de las estrategias digitales de sus clientes para dotarlas de una eficacia absoluta en cada mercado local, acelerando así la expansión internacional de cada uno de ellos.

Para una marca, el éxito del despliegue internacional de su estrategia digital y sus distintos tipos de contenido no depende de su apariencia internacional, sino de su destreza para sacar a relucir su identidad local y llegar a convertirse en una marca japonesa en Tokio, china en Cantón e italiana en Milán. 

Datawords proporciona soluciones a medida para sus clientes y trabaja estrechamente con ellos para adaptarlas constantemente a nuevos formatos. La adopción de la tecnología no sigue el mismo ritmo en todos los países, lo que revela un entorno digital global heterogéneo. Gracias a este enfoque, Datawords ha desarrollado el Datawords Multilingual Digital Suite, que permite seguir la complejidad de los proyectos digitales internacionales en una amplia variedad de tecnologías, incluyendo los sistemas de gestión de contenidos o los servidores de anuncios.

Las colaboraciones tecnológicas acordadas con los proveedores de soluciones más importantes, como Adobe, Sales Force Commerce Cloud o Sizmek, permiten a Datawords integrar perfectamente el Multilingual Digital Suite en su entorno digital actual.

Datawords también ha reforzado su oferta de producción de vídeos multilingües con la integración de Digiprod en septiembre de 2014, un medio de comunicación en auge en el mundo digital.

Datawords cuenta con la certificación ISO 9001 y ha recibido varios premios. El más reciente es el Digital International Award, otorgado por el IE-Club, en colaboración con Microsoft, Ubifrance y el Instituto Nacional Francés de Propiedad Industrial.
Especialidad de la Empresa: International Digital Consulting, Social Media, SEO/SEA, Video Production, Digital Strategy, Data Analytics, Translation and Copywriting, AI Chatbot, Website Localization y Content Management

Resumen de la empresa:
Founded in 2018, Leonid aims to transform the recruitment process, making the experience easier and more enjoyable for all involved. 

Through our leading Magic Month Principle, we're able to put the human back into human resources by putting clients and candidates back at the heart of everything we do. We don't abide by ruthless targets, instead, our unique business model ensures clients get the time and attention they deserve and candidates are treated like the talented human beings they are.  

We also have much happier employees too. They're given 1-2-1 mentoring on how to implement our unique business model that empowers them to be better talent acquisition managers, as well as being given lots of opportunities to meet their personal goals too! 

With a global reach, we specialise in talent acquisition for the Corporate Governance and Innovation Incentives sectors. Head over to our brand new website to find out more!

CLS is a global company and pioneer provider of monitoring and surveillance solutions for the Earth, created in 1986. We are subsidiary of the French Space Agency (CNES) and CNP, an investment firm. Our mission is to create innovative space-based solutions to understand and protect our planet and to manage its resources sustainably. CLS employs 900 people at our headquarters in Toulouse (France) and in 34 other sites around the world.

The company works in five strategic markets: sustainable fisheries management, environmental monitoring, maritime surveillance, mobility, and energy & infrastructures monitoring.

CLS processes data from 100,000 transponders per month (such as drifting buoys, animal tags, VMS transponders, & LRIT tracking) and observes the oceans and inland waters (more than 20 instruments onboard satellites daily deliver information to CLS on the world's seas and oceans). In addition, we monitor land and sea activities by satellite (nearly 10,000 radar images and several hundred drone flights are processed each year).

Committed to a sustainable planet, the company works every day for the Earth, from Space.

Wild Code School is a leading European tech school offering lifelong learning programs at 20+ campuses, remotely or at company’s offices.

Our blended, project-based, hands-on teaching approach brings together the power of our online learning platform and the network of 50+ full-time dedicated instructors.

We believe that learning will become the major human occupation. We support that vision by encouraging a supportive & joyful learning environment.

Passion, innovation and humanity are the values dear to our international community of 5.000+ students and alumni.

Resumen de la empresa:
“Accelerate the digital transformation of your business with digital identity verification."

Mitek (NASDAQ: MITK) is a global leader in mobile capture and digital identity verification solutions built on the latest advancements in AI and machine learning. Mitek’s identity verification solutions enable an enterprise to verify a user’s identity during a digital transaction, which assists financial institutions, payments companies and other businesses operating in highly regulated markets in mitigating financial risk and meeting regulatory requirements while increasing revenue from digital channels. Mitek also reduces the friction in the users’ experience with advanced data prefill and automation of the onboarding process. Mitek’s innovative solutions are embedded into the apps of more than 6,100 organizations and used by more than 80 million consumers for mobile check deposit, new account opening and more. 

For more information, visit us at www.miteksystems.com
Especialidad de la Empresa: Document Verification, ID Checking, Image Capture Verification, Passport Verification, Drivers License Pre-fill, Age Verification, Mobile Verify, Data Pre-fill, Mobile Capture, Mobile Remote Deposit Capture, Mobile Check Deposit, Mobile OCR, Digital Identity Verification y Online Identity Verification

Resumen de la empresa:
Uni Systems, a member of Quest Group, has been a reliable ICT partner to companies and organizations in the European market for over 58 years. We are the first IT company founded in Greece, in 1964, and we have been supporting our clients ever since. Trusting customers, extensive solutions offering, strong partnerships and experienced people, those are the main grounds for Uni Systems’ rapid expansion of operations across geographies and industries.

With more than 1100 specialized ICT professionals, established presence in more than 26 countries, and branches and subsidiaries in the heart of the European Union (Athens, Barcelona, Brussels, Bucharest, Luxembourg and Milan), we are effectively addressing the needs of European and International organizations and institutions and delivering value-added integrated solutions to our customers. 
Through our strong industrial vertical expertise, supported by the range of our horizontal solutions, we hold a substantial and successful track record in the delivery and implementation of large-scale, mission-critical projects in the sectors of Banking & Finance, Enterprise & Utilities, Government, and Telecommunications, as well as in EU Institutions and Agencies. 
Participations in real commercial implementations of best practices (i.e. ITIL, RUP, PRINCE2, PMI), has provided our people with significant experience, unique know-how and proven capability in designing, implementing and successfully supporting complex ICT projects, through a range of solutions and business areas.
At Uni Systems, we support innovation, and we have been investing in the European and National research ecosystem. Our Research and Innovation (RDI) department has been successfully bidding and winning a series of research programs in promising technological areas, such as 5G, AI in Health, and Blockchain in Governance.

Enabling our clients' digital transformation journey is our passion and we remain strongly committed to it.
Sector de la empresa: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI

At StreamSets, our mission is to make data engineering teams wildly successful. Only StreamSets offers a platform dedicated to building smart data pipelines to power DataOps across hybrid and multi-cloud architectures. That’s why the largest companies in the world trust StreamSets to power millions of data pipelines for modern business intelligence, data science, and AI/ML. With StreamSets, data engineers spend less time fixing and more time doing.

The StreamSets vision is guided by DataOps, a set of practices and technologies that operationalizes data management and integration to ensure resilience and agility despite constant change. StreamSets technologies are architected with a modern approach to data engineering integration and operations. 

The StreamSets DataOps platform enables companies to design, deploy, monitor and govern smart data pipelines at scale. StreamSets Control Hub, a cloud-native control plane to design, is used to monitor and manage complex data movement. Deploy using StreamSets Data Collector, an execution engine for fast data ingestion, or StreamSets Transformer, a Spark-native execution engine for ETL and machine learning. 

Global 2000 customers use StreamSets to simplify data integration for data lakes and data warehouses, to speed and manage cloud data platform adoption, and to power real-time applications for streaming analytics.

Founded in 2014 by Girish Pancha, former chief product officer of Informatica, and Arvind Prabhakar, a former engineering leader at Cloudera, StreamSets is backed by top-tier Silicon Valley venture capital firms, including Battery Ventures, New Enterprise Associates (NEA), Accel Partners, Harmony Partners, and Tenaya Capital. The company is headquartered in San Francisco with offices in Europe and Australia.

Visit: streamsets.com
Especialidad de la Empresa: big data ingest, event processing, data integration, streaming data, data operations, dataops, data engineering, data pipelines, data migration y cloud data migration

Resumen de la empresa:
OUR DRIVING PURPOSE - DESIGN TO VALUE
The process of delivering built assets has become fragmented. As a result, value is diluted at every stage.

A UNIFYING APPROACH
The most efficient route to the most efficient solution is first to make sure you analyse and understand a project from every angle. Maximising the value of an asset is finding the right balance of a wide range of criteria.

Design to Value is well understood and applied in the manufacturing industries. It leads to objective analysis of every aspect of a process, every element of resource requirement, energy consumption, knowledge, and cost. It leads to testing of the value parameters each of these elements is being measured against. It is rigorous, logical and data-driven. Its application in construction is transformational.

ITERATE IN DIGITAL
Our approach is to dismantle a process rigorously until we reduce it to its smallest components. Then we call on a breadth and depth of expertise to optimise every component, so that when we combine them in the complete solution, the whole will operate to the maximum efficiency of all of its parts.
From the earliest stages, we work with 3-D visualisations of processes and physical assets. This allows us to iterate and test multiple variables.

AUTOMATION IN CONSTRUCTION
There are many elements of built assets that are, or could be, automated or standardised across multiple processes in one or more sectors and industries. The benefits of standardisation are visible every day in the manufacturing industry, at global scale. We bring them to construction, in our Platforms approach to Design for Manufacture and Assembly (P-DfMA).

A PROVEN APPROACH
We do not come to any project with a ready-made solution. We bring only our Design to Value approach, using the combined powers of data, technology and imagination to establish what the most effective solution will be.

Design to Value is proven to deliver better results for our clients - and for the built environment.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Architecture + Integrated Design, Structural + Civil Engineering, Design for Asset Optimisation, Chip Thinking, DfMA, Systemisation + Platforms, BIM, Mechanical + Electrical Engineering, Process Facility Design, Creative Technologies, software design, PDfMA, Generative design, Computational design, Sustainability, Green architecture, Passivhaus, Data center design, Healthcare design, Data center architect y Hospital design

Resumen de la empresa:
Mediktor is the most accurate AI-based medical assistant for triage and pre-diagnosis. The technology combines artificial intelligence and natural language recognition with patient data to explore symptoms and offer a listing of possible conditions and recommendations.  And, using our clients’ provider networks, the user can connect to a clinician immediately for care and consultation.

The Mediktor platform learns from every interaction, developing an advanced intuition. Mediktor has already performed 3 million symptom evaluations in 181 countries.  This has led to the development of an intuition comparable to the full life experience of 10 physicians. The platform has undergone a clinical study with 1,015 patients achieving a success rate of 91.3% accuracy. Four other trials are underway across the world.  The “white-label” technology is available in 10 languages and for any platform.

Founded in 2011 by Oscar García-Esquirol, MD, a specialist in intensive care medicine and Cristian Pascual, industrial engineer, Mediktor is based in Barcelona and has recently opened an office in New York. Mediktor has a multidisciplinary team of health professionals, computer scientists, business development experts and external advisors.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Artificial Intelligence, Symptom Checker, Machine Learning, Triage, Natural Language Processing, Natural Language Recognition, Digital Health, mHealth, eHealth, Healthcare, Medical Device, Health Insurance, Health Tech, Insurtech, Hospital, Emergency Department, Emergency Room, Health Systems y Medical Schemes

AirDNA empowers our customers with the data to set them apart, and the insights to keep them ahead.

Optimize your vacation rental listings and revolutionize your real estate investing in short-term vacation rentals through MarketMinder's interactive bottom-up and top-down market analysis. TREND REPORTS AND PROPERTY PERFORMANCE DATA FEEDS

Nacida de la unión de las start-ups xFarm y Farm Technologies, ofrece apps para la gestión de explotaciones, sensores conectados, apoyo en proyectos de Transformación Digital, algoritmos aplicados a la agricultura y actividades de formación para todo el sector.

AllRead Machine Learning Technologies is a Computer Vision Deep Tech Startup developing a cutting-edge Character Recognition Technology, based on a Deep Learning neural network model. Our Lead partners are the Mobile World Capital Barcelona and the Computer Vision Center of Barcelona

AllRead MLT tracks down, extracts and converts into Big Data the relevant alphanumeric text from operational environments, using Visual Computing software.

Text represents data and appears omnipresent in the value chain of companies with industrial processes (serial numbers, ID codes, meter readings...). AllRead MLT creates value through an innovative and frictionless (mobile) solution to gather data, providing automatic and accurate extraction of the targeted content in operations. It improves efficiency reducing repetitive manual tasks and allowing immediate digitization and processing of the information. 

AllRead MLT focuses on the Logistics, Utilities and Manufacturing sectors, and is commercialized through a Software-as-a-Service and a Software Development Kit, able to run directly on mobile devices. 

AllRead MLT was launched through the collaboration of the Mobile World Capital Venture Building program as our Lead Investor and the Center of Computer Vision at the Universidad Autonoma de Barcelona.

Resumen de la empresa:
No solo recolectamos datos, también los conectamos. YouGov es un grupo internacional de análisis y estudio de mercado. Nuestra cadena de valor es un círculo perfeccionado formado por un panel online muy comprometido y métodos directo que nos ofrecen, de forma continua, una gran cantidad de información.  
Nuestra oferta de datos proviene de un panel altamente participativo de más de 11 millones de personas en todo el mundo, lo que nos proporcionan flujos de datos continuos y en directo. Capturamos y descargamos estos datos a través de nuestra variedad de plataformas de recogida de datos y los unificamos en YouGov Cube, una exclusiva biblioteca de datos única en el mundo.   
Potenciamos el valor de todos los datos conectados gracias a nuestra tecnología de vanguardia y una sólida experiencia en investigación de mercado, lo que nos hace capaces de ofrecer a nuestros clientes una plataforma de investigación innovadora para crear, mejorar y redefinir cualquier tipo de campaña o acción de marketing. Fundada en Reino Unido en el año 2000, YouGov es considerada la empresa pionera en el análisis de datos y estudios de mercado online.  
Nuestro exclusivo modelo online totalmente integrado dispone de un historial bien documentado y publicado, que refleja la precisión de nuestros métodos de encuesta y, a su vez, justifica la calidad del trabajo de servicio al cliente. 
Desarrollamos análisis y estudios en todo el mundo, lo que nos permite ofrecer a los clientes resultados internacionales de forma más rápida y rentable que los métodos tradicionales, sin influir en la calidad de los resultados.  
YouGov dispone de oficinas en Reino Unido, USA, Europa, MENA y APAC. Nuestro objetivo principal es entender a tu organización, el mundo que la rodea y el sector en el que trabaja: lo que nos permite ofrecerle un volumen continuo de datos precisos junto a una visión global de lo que la gente piensa y hace en todo el mundo

In 14 years, we've grown into an all-in-one marketing suite consisting of more than 55+ products, tools and add-ons that help companies market better online. Our vision is to create the only tool a digital marketing team would ever need to improve their online marketing results, ensure a smooth workflow between team members and save time on routine tasks. 

Semrush is a trusted data provider. Our information on online behavior is used by the largest media outlets around the world such as Bloomberg, The Washington Post, Reuters and others.

Resumen de la empresa:
Founded in 2012, AfterShip is an automation platform that empowers eCommerce retailers to create and manage the world’s best online shopping experiences.

Best known for post-purchase products AfterShip and Returns Center, we also enhance pre-purchase automation with Automizely Marketing. In fact, we offer a complete suite of tools to build an end-to-end customer journey that turbo charges engagement, revenue, and loyalty.

Trusted by over 100,000 eCommerce retailers like Gymshark, Kylie Cosmetics, and Murad, AfterShip is the one-stop shop for eCommerce tools that support website pop-ups, advanced email flows, page building, shipment visibility, branded shipment tracking, proactive email and SMS notifications, returns, and exchanges.

Dynatrace exists to make software work perfectly. Our platform combines broad and deep observability and continuous runtime application security with advanced AIOps to provide answers and intelligent automation from data. This enables innovators to modernize and automate cloud operations, deliver software faster and more securely, and ensure flawless digital experiences. 

Read more at dynatrace.com, visit the blog, or find @dynatrace on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.

Teladoc Health, Inc. (NYSE: TDOC) es el líder mundial en servicios de telemedicina. Ofrece la única solución integral de asistencia médica virtual capaz de atender a organizaciones y personas en todo el mundo, integrando de una manera sencilla la telemedicina, los servicios médicos especializados y de segunda opinión médica de manera que mejora el acceso, la eficiencia y la sostenibilidad. 

Con una tecnología clasificada entre las mejores del mundo en el prestigioso informe KLAS (ranking de mejores plataformas tecnológicas de telemedicina), Teladoc Health colabora con miles de organizaciones, hospitales, sistemas sanitarios y compañías aseguradoras en más de 175 países, con el objetivo de transformar la prestación de servicios en el sector salud.

New Relic helps engineers and developers do their best work every day — using data, not opinions — at every stage of the software lifecycle.

The world’s best engineering teams rely on New Relic to visualize, analyze and troubleshoot their software. New Relic One is the most powerful cloud-based observability platform built to help companies create more perfect software. Learn why customers trust New Relic for improved uptime and performance, greater scale and efficiency, and accelerated time to market at newrelic.com.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Web Application Monitoring, Ruby Monitoring, Web Performance Monitoring, PHP Monitoring, Python Monitoring, Java Monitoring, .NET Monitoring, Mobile App Monitoring, Node.js Monitoring, Synthetic Monitoring, Infrastructure Monitoring, Application Performance Monitoring, Observability, Kubernetes Monitoring, container monitoring, docker monitoring y lambda monitoring

Resumen de la empresa:
Digilant ofrece soluciones y servicios de compra programáticos diseñados para agencias y marcas que están incrementando su inversión publicitaria. Utilizando ciencia de datos para acceder a información de audiencia única y propia, Digilant permite a las marcas descubrir nuevos clientes y proporcionar la inteligencia que necesitan para competir en los principales canales de medios.
 
Somos una empresa de marketing y comunicación basada en datos que genera a las marcas oportunidades de crecimiento de negocio, basadas en un profundo conocimiento de los consumidores, las tecnologías de comercialización y los ecosistemas de datos. Implementamos y optimizamos campañas radicalmente transparentes que son relevantes para cada consumidor, generan retornos y son resilientes en este cambiante entorno.
 
Con sede en Boston, Digilant tiene oficinas en Nueva York, Miami, Chicago, Dallas y San Francisco y en  el resto del mundo en Barcelona, Bogotá, Lima, Madrid, Ciudad de México, Monterrey, Ciudad de Panamá y Santiago. Para obtener más información, visita www.digilant.com o síguenos en Twitter @Digilant_US. Digilant es una compañía de ispDigital Group (www.ispdigital.com).

FNA is a fast-growing, deep technology analytics company and a leader in Regulatory Technology (RegTech) and Supervisory Technology (SupTech). The FNA Platform allows financial institutions to map and monitor complex financial networks, optimize liquidity and to simulate operational and financial risks. FNA’s clients include the world’s largest central banks, regulators, financial market infrastructures (FMIs), and leading financial institutions.

FNA's mission is to make the financial system safer and more efficient and to play a pivotal role in the growing Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning ecosystem, where FNA's engine powers use cases across a growing number of business domains.

The EBMT is a non-profit medical and scientific organisation established in 1974 which hosts a unique patient registry providing a pool of data to perform studies and assess new trends. We aim to be the connection between patients, researchers and other stakeholders to anticipate the future of cellular and stem cell-based therapies. Our community of healthcare professionals is focused on innovation, research and the advancement of these fields to save and improve the lives of patients with blood-related disorders. Visit www.ebmt.org to learn more about membership, JACIE Accreditation, educational opportunities and how to get involved.

Are you interested in working with us? Check out our open career opportunities on our website at: https://www.ebmt.org/career-opportunities

Follow us on Twitter, Facebook and YouTube @TheEBMT.
Especialidad de la Empresa: hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, Cellular Therapy, blood cancers, Research, Education, Patient care, Nursing, Accreditation, stem cells y healthcare

Resumen de la empresa: Checkpoint Systems is a global leader in EAS and RFID solutions for the retail industry, encompassing loss prevention and merchandise visibility solutions in a growing omni channel environment.  A division of CCL Industries, Checkpoint Systems is the only vertically integrated RF/RFID solution provider for retail. With consumer demands accelerating at an extraordinary rate driven by technology, Checkpoint delivers intelligent solutions – bringing clarity and efficiency into the retail environment anytime, anywhere. Through a unique offering of software, hardware, labels, tags and connected cloud-based solutions, Checkpoint optimizes retail operations and efficiencies with real-time intuitive data delivered throughout the supply chain and in-store resulting in improved profitability and an enriched consumer experience. Checkpoint's intelligent retail solutions are built upon 50 years of radio frequency technology expertise, innovative high-theft and loss prevention solutions, market-leading software, RFID hardware and comprehensive labeling capabilities to brand, secure and track merchandise from source to shelf.

Fever is the leading entertainment discovery platform, with a mission to inspire people through experiences. We are looking for bar-raisers that want to work hard, have fun and make history with us. Fever combines its marketplace and Secret Media Network (Secret London, Secret NYC, Madrid Secreto, Paris Secret, etc) through technology to reach over 15 million people per week. Fever has also rolled out the Fever Originals, which are proprietary events in which we follow a data-driven content creation strategy, using analytics to understand audiences and develop new experiences.

Fever is present in London, New York, Los Angeles, Paris, Lisbon, and Spain, and is in process of expanding to new markets. Fever is also backed by top-notch institutional investors, including Atresmedia, Accel Partners, Lab-Tech, and 14W Ventures.


Available for iOS and Android.

SWISSLOG LOGISTICS AUTOMATION –SOLUCIONES INTRALOGÍSTICAS ROBÓTIZADAS Y BASADAS EN INFORMACIÓN QUE GARANTIZAN LA MÁXIMA FLEXIBILIDAD

Automatización de vanguardia para el centro de distribución del mañana: Swisslog diseña y desarrolla una amplia gama de soluciones de automatización; desde tecnologías producto a persona para cargas ligeras o pesadas, hasta software inteligente o robots que aprenden por sí mismos. A través de un servicio de consultoría específico para los requerimientos de cada caso, nuestro objetivo es garantizar a nuestros clientes las mejores soluciones de automatización para una actividad específica, optimizando el espacio, el tiempo y los costes.

Swisslog Logistics Automation ha mejorado las prestaciones de empresas en diferentes sectores, incluyendo:
• Comercio minorista y comercio electrónico: reducción de errores en la preparación de pedidos, mejora en las tasas de picking y gestión de inventario y devoluciones
• Bebidas: mayor eficiencia y utilización del espacio
• Alimentos y Temperatura Controlada: maximice la productividad para el suministro más fresco
• Productos farmacéuticos: fiabilidad en el transporte, almacenamiento, preparación de pedidos y control de calidad

Swisslog forma parte del grupo KUKA, uno de los principales proveedores mundiales de soluciones inteligentes de automatización.

Enlace de la prensa: https://www.swisslog.com/en-us/footer/legal-disclaimer/
Especialidad de la Empresa: Autonomous Mobile Robots, Automated Storage & Retrieval Systems, Automatic Guided Vehicles, Pallet Conveying Systems, Warehouse Management Software, Solutions for retail & ecommerce, food & beverage, pharma and other industries, Logistics, Logistics Automation, Warehouse Robotics, Supply Chain, Software, Technology y Automation

Resumen de la empresa:
El Grupo QbD apoya a las empresas de ciencias de la vida de todo el mundo durante todo el ciclo de vida del producto, desde la idea hasta el paciente. Somos una empresa multinacional con más de 450 empleados altamente cualificados. Nuestro experimentado equipo presta servicios a la industria de las ciencias de la vida en general, con un fuerte enfoque en los ATMP, los dispositivos médicos, los IVD y la salud digital, gracias a la experiencia específica que hemos construido en estas áreas. Los servicios que ofrecemos se engloban en las siguientes divisiones: 

- Asuntos regulatorios: Ayudamos a nuestros clientes en su recorrido por todo el ciclo de vida regulatorio de medicamentos y dispositivos médicos. 

- Clínica: Somos un proveedor de soluciones clínicas experto y especializado en productos sanitarios y biotecnología, que ofrece servicios globales de CRO y consultoría. 

- Calificación y validación: Garantizamos que los productos satisfacen las exigencias de calidad y cumplen la normativa mediante la cualificación y validación de sus procesos, equipos y software. 

- Garantía de calidad: Ofrecemos toda la gama de servicios de garantía de calidad necesarios para que su producto llegue al mercado de forma segura y conforme a la normativa, incluida la auditoría de auditores certificados, la creación de su SGC y todas las actividades de QP (persona cualificada). 

- Control de calidad: Nuestra división de control de calidad consiste en un laboratorio de GMP que ofrece servicios analíticos para probar las materias primas farmacéuticas, los excipientes y las pruebas de liberación de los productos acabados. 

- Soluciones de software: Software de gestión de la calidad basado en la nube y validado previamente, construido para las ciencias de la vida, así como servicios de eIFU que permiten a los fabricantes de IVD y MD digitalizar las instrucciones de uso (IFU) en papel. 

- Llegar al mercado: Le ayudamos a lanzar su producto al mercado proporcionando servicios de market

Innovative and sustainable key technologies are prerequisites for renewable energy supply. More than 3,000 employees from 18 countries work to ensure that SMA is actively helping to promote the production and development of PV system technology worldwide.

SMA is the only inverter manufacturer worldwide that offers the right inverter for every module type and system size ; for small residential systems, medium-sized commercial systems and large-scale plants; grid-connected photovoltaic systems; and off-grid and hybrid systems. 

SMA also develops technologically leading system solutions and is on the leading edge of the energy of the future, in areas such as intelligent optimization of self-consumption, grid integration of solar power and integration of batteries for more effective use of renewable energies. 

The intention of this LinkedIn profile is to share expert knowledge in inverter technology, interesting reference projects and new products in the field of commercial and large-scale solar power plants and to discuss today’s and future energy supply structures and solutions. We are looking forward to your comments, questions and feedback.

Corporate information: https://www.sma.de/en/corporate-information.html
Data Protection: https://www.sma.de/en/data-protection-declaration.html
Sector de la empresa: Fabricación de semiconductores de energías renovables

Resumen de la empresa:
Athena is an International group with 50 years of history,  manufacturing facilities in Italy, Brazil and India, logistics hubs in Spain, USA and China, over 800 employees worldwide and a global turnover of 147mln € in 2021.
Athena's Headquarter is located nearby Vicenza, in Northern Italy.

Athena is structured into 4 business units: Industries, Parts, Electronics and Sportech, all linked by a common goal: to offer the market high-quality products, made with solid know-how and selected to perfectly fit customer's needs:

Athena Industries: Athena designs and manufactures customised technical solutions for blanked products and innovative sealing systems, operating in the field of OE industrial supply, specifically Vehicles, Automotive, Powertrain, Agricultural and Earthmoving Equipment, Heating and Insulation, Professional appliances and Hydraulics.

Athena Parts: Athena develops innovative mechanical solutions for the motor's world, producing and distributing a wide range of selected technical aftermarket parts for the motorbike, car, marine and industrial transportation sectors. Athena's offering is unique worldwide for its size and price/quality ratio.

Athena Sportech: distribution of highly innovative and appealing brands capable of providing distinctive features in terms of positioning and market innovation.
Athena Sportech is official distributor of Segway, Fitbit, VR46, Ogio, Skullcandy, Leatt, Troy Lee Designs, Aftershokz, Crosscall, Smartshake, Smellwell, Traeger, Cosmo Connected, Goalzero and identifies new technology trends in the global market as well as latent consumer needs.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Cylinder Kit, Engine Control Units, Gaskets, Motorcycle Exhaust, Brand distribution, Metal Parts, Rubber Molded Parts, Industrial Gaskets, Automotive, HVAC, Professional Appliances, OEM Supply, Co-Engineering, Sealing systems, Manufacturing, Mechanics, Hydraulics, Driveline, Powertrain, Thermal Insulations, Lightweight vehicles, Data Acquisition, Racing, mobility, outdoor, bike y aftermarket

Resumen de la empresa: Hornetsecurity es un proveedor líder de servicios gestionados de seguridad. Nuestros productos se encargan de brindarle una comunicación segura a su servicio de correo electrónico. Los servicios gestionados de seguridad, se encuentran a la disposición inmediata, no necesitan de ningún software y/o hardware adicional y tampoco requieren ningún esfuerzo de mantenimiento. Nuestras soluciones son compatibles con todos los servidores y sistemas de correo conocidos, y se generan de manera centralizada, a través de distintos centros de datos – 24 horas al día, 7 días a la semana, 365 días al año. Día a día, a cualquier hora filtramos y archivamos millones de emails para empresas de todos los tamaños, así como a organizaciones, ofreciéndole una comunicación electrónica segura – garantizada.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Information Security Solutions, Managed Email Security, Web Filtering, Email Archiving, Email Continuity Service, Solutions for SMBs, Spam Filter Service, Advanced Threat Protection (ATP), Data Security, Email Encryption, Data Encryption, Spam Filtering, SIEM Services, Microsoft Office 365 Protection, Awareness Training, Microsoft 365 Security, Backup, Compliance, Cloud Security, Ransomware Protection, Malware Protection y Phishing Protection

Resumen de la empresa:
TERRITORY ist ein Kommunikationsunternehmen, das Agenturgeschäft und eigene digitale Produkte vereint. An sieben deutschen und fünf europäischen Standorten arbeiten unsere Mitarbeiter:innen daran, Marken, Unternehmen und Institutionen spezifische Lösungen für alle Felder moderner Kommunikation anzubieten. Bei TERRITORY glauben wir an starke Strategie und überzeugende Konzeption, mutige Kreation und echte Geschichten, an smarte Technologie und mediale Kraft. Die flexible Netzwerkorganisation besteht aus der Kommunikationsagentur TERRITORY, die Kompetenzbereiche wie Storytelling & Journalism, Strategie, Design, Campaigns & Brand, Audio & Video, Influencer Marketing, Video & Audio, PR & Experiences bis hin zu Tech & Data sowie Webservices vereint; TERRITORY Media als Full-Service Media-Agentur, die Media und Performance vernetzt; sowie TERRITORY Embrace als Agentur für Employer Branding, Recruiting und Personalmarketing mit eigenen digitalen Plattformen wie Ausbildung.de oder MeinPraktikum.de. Das Unternehmen ist Teil von Bertelsmann und hat seinen Hauptsitz in Hamburg.

WHO WE ARE
We create video technology software that helps people understand what they are looking at - in security and beyond.

We find information in video data that people can act on:
– Either to revisit things that happened in the past
– Or to see things in real-time
– and soon we will be able to see things before they actually happen.
In other words, we make the world see.

MILESTONE AS AN EMPLOYER
When joining Milestone, you will be part of the world’s leading provider of IP Video Management Systems. Since our start in Denmark in 1998, we have grown to over 1.000 employees across development centers and regional offices in more than 25 countries. Today, our solutions are used in 500,000+ installations worldwide – with many more to come.

We believe, that our success first and foremost is based on our sworn dedication to put people first – the people we work with and the people around us. It's how we grow our culture, our business, and our community. We want to blaze new trails, stay curious and push the industry standard. Investing in people is how we do it. Because at Milestone, we grow together. Are you ready to grow your career, then visit milestone.com/careers

PRIVACY POLICY
Milestone has always been a strong proponent of safety and security – especially when it comes to that of the individual. We take privacy concerns very seriously and do our utmost to be transparent about how we store and use data. As a consequence, we salute the GDPR initiative and its ambition to safeguard personal privacy. For further information on how we handle and use data, please see our privacy policy at: https://www.milestonesys.com/privacy-policy.
Especialidad de la Empresa: IP Video Surveillance Software y Video Management Software

Preply is a global language learning marketplace, connecting 50,000+ tutors with millions of learners from all over the world. Since the company launched in 2012, students have signed up to more than 15 million lessons.

Backed by some of the world’s leading investors, Preply is on a mission to shape the future of effective learning. Fueled by a belief that live engagement with a teacher is still the most effective way to learn a new skill, Preply is building a personalized learning space that will enable individual learners to reach their goals in the fastest way possible.

Powered by a tenfold increase in revenues over the last three years, Preply is now leading the online language tutoring segment globally and has 400+ employees of over 50 nationalities based across Barcelona, Kyiv, and the US. Preply is driven by a culture of experimentation and data-driven learnings focused on building best-in-class consumer and enterprise solutions.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Education, Tutoring, Marketplace, Online Education, Software Development y ed-tech

Resumen de la empresa:
Napptilus es una empresa tecnológica que ofrece desarrollo de software y además crea sus propias startups.

Nuestra empresa cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector tecnológico y está formado por un gran grupo heterogéneo formado por ingenieros, gurús tecnológicos, diseñadores, marketing strategists y emprendedores. Un grupo completo que nos permite ofrecer las últimas tecnologías a aquellas empresas que confían en nosotros.

Además de contar con una gran experiencia en desarrollo de soluciones web, aplicaciones nativas de iOS y android y en aplicaciones híbridas, también invertimos en I+D en campos como la Inteligencia Artificial, asistentes virtuales, reconstrucción 3D, biometría y Big Data.

Algunas de las startups que hemos lanzado en el mercado son: Bibulu, StageInHome, TracksCo2, Earthdas, Pinroute, Dada, Magnetika, Vodity e iFamilyNetworks.

Resumen de la empresa:
Sollers Consulting is an international operational advisory and software integrator. Established in 2000, the company supports insurers, banks, and leasing firms in business transformations and adapting to modern technologies. Over the last 2 decades Sollers has helped 100 financial groups, including Allianz, AXA, BNP Paribas Cardif, Basler, Generali, Zurich, Santander Consumer Bank, Aviva, Liberty, Beazley, VHV, VIG, NN, Warta, Amica and ING to enhance their digital capabilities.   

Sollers’ expanding portfolio includes RIFE™, a low code and highly configurable platform proven in bancassurance and affinity insurance business that allows to deliver new products in fast way and truly embed insurance.  

Sollers Consulting cooperates with more than 15 technology providers such as Guidewire Software, Fadata, Oracle, AWS, Google Cloud and Microsoft. Over 900 business and IT specialists from Warsaw, Cologne, Tokyo, Paris, Barcelona, Lublin, Poznan, Gdansk and Wroclaw, are helping financial institutions in Germany, Great Britain, Poland, Scandinavia, France, Japan, the USA and many other countries in the world, to reap the benefits of digitalisation. For more information, please visit sollers.eu.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Business and IT Consulting, Enterprise Architecture, Data Quality, Master Data Management, Data Integration, System implementation and integration (Software Factory), Responsive Web Design, Core insurance systems, Insurance front-ends, DevOps, Cloud, Process Automation, Migration y Quality Assurance

Resumen de la empresa:
We are a worldwide provider of ground displacement (slope stability, subsidence, uplift, heave, etc.) measurements using satellite radar data. We produce high quality and reliable measurements for Mining, Oil & Gas and Infrastructure companies to contribute to safety and cost efficiency in operations. 

DARES TECHNOLOGY is known for its unique measurement reliability and for our service excellence, with continuous innovation to offer always the latest technology. We are proud of our extraordinary team, formed by globally recognized highly skilled radar, GIS and geological experts. Thanks to our broad experience we provide optimal solutions to solve our clients’ needs and challenges. Our headquarters are based in Spain with delegations in Chile, United States, Canada, Australia and Turkey. Some of our client references include ESA, EU, Abertis, Airbus, Glencore, AngloAmerican, Codelco, Total, World Bank, Government of Spain, Origin Energy, KGHM, NewCrest, Sibelco, NewMomt, Southern, Rio Tinto, TECK and BHP.

Resumen de la empresa:
STADA es un socio de confianza orientado fundamentalmente al cuidado de la salud de las personas. Para conseguir este objetivo dedicamos nuestros esfuerzos a seguir acelerando la trayectoria de éxito de nuestra empresa.

STADA es un fabricante líder de medicamentos de alta calidad. Con una larga tradición que se remonta a las antiguas farmacias, gozamos desde hace más de 120 años de una buena reputación como socios seguros y fiables. Con nuestros productos ayudamos a las personas a mantener y recuperar una vida sana y digna de ser vivida. Nuestros genéricos de eficacia probada contribuyen a conseguir que el cuidado diario de la salud sea asequible. Ofrecemos a nuestros empleados un atractivo entorno de trabajo en el que se fomenta el desarrollo personal.
STADA Arzneimittel AG vende sus productos en aproximadamente 120 países de todo el mundo. Algunos de nuestros productos de marca como Grippostad, Aqualor, Snup y Ladival se encuentran entre los más vendidos de su categoría. En el ejercicio de 2020, STADA alcanzó unas ventas ajustadas de grupo de 3.010,3 millones de euros y unos ingresos ajustados antes de intereses, impuestos, depreciaciones y amortizaciones (EBITDA) de 713,3 millones de euros. A 31 de diciembre de 2020, STADA contaba con una plantilla de 12.301 personas en todo el mundo.  

¿Está buscando una interesante oportunidad laboral que le permita avanzar en su carrera profesional dentro del sector farmacéutico? Consulte nuestras ofertas de empleo en: www.stada.com/career

Política de protección de datos y pie de imprenta: www.stada.com/data-protection, www.stada.com/imprint
Especialidad de la Empresa: Pharmaceuticals, Health Care, Generics, Consumer Health y Biopharmaceuticals

Resumen de la empresa:
We are a dynamic and forward-thinking firm that operates across a wide range of industries. With our multidisciplinary teams, we create bold strategies and innovative solutions tailored to our client's needs as we enable them to capitalise on opportunities. Together we strive to bring long-lasting impact and celebrate collective victories. At Metyis, our work environment unifies creative problem-solving and strategic thinking. We provide resources to visionaries who understand the direction that the world is moving. Tomorrow's world is data-driven, digital and international.
 
Our selection of services stands to equip clients with the knowledge and tools to maximise their potential. Strategies are designed with a long-term vision and targets are set with a clear direction to drive continuous progress. Our services empower our clients to streamline the flow of information and support growth, strengthen the core and harmonise operations. They enable data-driven decision-making and allow our clients to confront the future from a place of understanding. Our fresh approach to consulting is vibrant and pioneers customisation to attentively advise and guide clients through a hands-on implementation process.
 
At Metyis, we strongly believe in long-lasting partnerships. A choice that builds on trust, transparency and pursuing common goals. Built around the fundamental objective to support growth and leveraging shared interests. We are devoted to our partners and help them build specific capacities and capabilities. Each partnership is unique and carefully crafted to meet the needs of our partners' strategic objectives. Partnerships can take the form of a particular purpose hub, joint ventures or long-term service agreements. We at Metyis empower partners to access the full potential of their businesses. To us, a partnership is all about being the right partner and collectively creating impact.

We are Metyis. Partners for impact.

EPLAN provides software and service solutions in the fields of electrical, automation and mechatronic engineering. The company develops one of the world’s leading design software solutions for machine and panel builders. EPLAN is also the ideal partner to streamline challenging engineering processes. 
Both standardised as well as customised interfaces to ERP and PLM/PDM systems ensure data consistency along the whole value chain. Working with EPLAN means boundless communication across all engineering disciplines. No matter whether small or large enterprises: Customers can apply their expertise more efficiently. Worldwide, EPLAN supports more than 65,000 customers. EPLAN wants to grow further with customers and partners and pushes integration and automation in engineering forward. Within the EPLAN Partner Network, open interfaces and seamless integrations are realised together with partners. „Efficient engineering“ is the focus.
EPLAN was founded in 1984 and is part of the owner-operated Friedhelm Loh Group. The Friedhelm Loh Group operates worldwide with more than 12 production sites and over 90 international subsidiaries. The entire group employs more than 11.600 people and generated revenues of €2,5 billion in 2021. For the 14th time in succession, the family business has won the accolade “Top German Employer” in 2022. In addition, Friedhelm Loh Group was recognized as “Top vocational trainer” according to a study of Deutschland Test and Focus Money.

For more information visit:
www.eplan.de and www.friedhelm-loh-group.com

WE ARE GARCIA

Conceived in Italy, crafted in the Netherlands. GARCIA is the fashion brand with a denim heart.

We are part of the JOG Group, our mother company under which Jeans Centre (Jeans Specialist retailer with 100 stores & online), GARCIA Outlets (38 Outlet Stores across Europe), and GARCIA operate.

The company is family owned, was founded in 1977 and has over 1000 employees across Europe. 

GARCIA’s Head Office is based in Ablasserdam, a small city under the wings of Rotterdam, the Netherlands. 

In 2018 GARCIA is sold in 35 countries, with an estimated turnover of 110 million euro and with the DACH* Area as our biggest market.

IT'S ABOUT HUMANS

Our mission is to improve the health of individuals and populations in resource-poor countries through advanced AI applications.

benshi.ai focuses on providing powerful, personalized, data-driven insights to medical care teams and individual patients. We build machine learning products to benefit real-life communities.

Our passionate team of scientists, engineers, and creative minds works closely with our partners to push the frontiers of AI and global health. We are a non-profit funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

We are a global workplace strategy, design, and construction leader creating experiential spaces for a rapidly changing world.  

We believe our spaces should spark brilliance in people who use them. Together as One Team, we create environments that deepen connections, foster a sense of belonging and propel success. 

As we knock down the barriers between strategy, design, and construction, we deliver our projects on meaningful timeframes, collaborate free of egos, and strive for excellence across all aspects of our work, without sacrificing any one discipline. 

We are a global partner, driven by data and real-world insights, and we honor local culture everywhere we work.

WHO WE ARE

Do you love learning? Does the idea of working for an EdTech company that was born in Silicon Valley and has offices in Barcelona and San Francisco excite you? Then Edpuzzle might just be your perfect fit.


Used in over 50% of schools in the USA, Edpuzzle makes it easy for teachers to engage their students with interactive video lessons.


We’re a small team of talented creatives (many of us former teachers) who got our start back in 2013 at ImagineK12, the first education incubator in the USA and now part of Y Combinator, where Airbnb and Dropbox were born. We have fantastic support from our teachers and investors, who allow us to continue growing our Edpuzzle community every day.


WHAT WE DO

We empower teachers to make any video their lesson with our easy-to-use video editing tools and beautiful, hassle-free analytics showing students’ results. In just a few clicks, teachers can turn any video into an engaging and effective lesson, and then see in real time which students understood the lesson and who needs help, thanks to the insightful student data Edpuzzle gathers.

WHY WE DO IT

We dream of a day where every teacher and student will be just a click away from an excellent online education, and we’re working to turn it into a reality. Together with the teachers in our Edpuzzle community, we’re creating a pool of incredible quality, inspiring video lessons for the classroom.
Especialidad de la Empresa: video-editing, formative assessment, tracking, flipped classroom, education y edtech

Resumen de la empresa:
Retail Rocket is an all-in-1 Retention Management Platform.
We help solve three main tasks: make high-end marketing technologies easier to use for marketers, improve marketing efficiency for the business and make marketing actually useful for your customers. The platform has everything your business needs to grow LTV and generate repeat sales based on Big Data: 

— empower your business with CDP and store all the data you need to build marketing campaigns in Data Warehouse module
— segment your customer database using smart mathematical models available in our Customer Intelligence module
— develop efficient marketing communications for key customer segments across email, web / mobile push, SMS and other channels with Campaign Management System
— personalise every step of the customer journey via our AI Personalization Engine


Retail Rocket is a global company with a team of more than 20 different nationalities active in Europe since 2016. Since our foundation in 2012, we have successfully completed over 1000 projects all around the world. The European HQ is located in The Hague (Netherlands) and we have offices in Barcelona (Spain) and Berlin (Germany). Our data warehouse is securely located in Germany. Retail Rocket has also offices in Latin America and Asia. The company is owned by a European investment group.

SEA Vision is since 25 years a leading vision systems provider for worldwide pharmaceutical companies and CMOs, and owes its success to the quality of its technological solutions. Today SEA Vision has successfully supplied over 1500 full track and trace systems and more than 6000 inspection systems worldwide. SEA Vision Group has recently launched a revolutionary Pharma 4.0 solution: yudoo. The new Pharma-designed software suite reshapes the concept of centralized line management, Track and trace and 4.0 Business Intelligence analysis. Infomineo is the global leader in the business of "brainshoring".

Infomineo allows its clients to focus on their core activities by outsourcing support activities which require judgment and critical thinking (hence brain-shoring) to locations where they would not operate otherwise (currently Casablanca and Cairo, and Mexico city soon). To guarantee the best return on investment to our clients we operate on a retainer basis.

We help our clients access insights which are critical for decision making (our research service), access expertise (our expert network), translate business concepts (our translation service) and represent data in a beautiful and creative way (our design services).

Infomineo serves all the leading global consulting firms, and now more than 50 of the Fortune 500 companies.

Infomineo is ISO 27001 certified (Information Security)

Learn more about Infomineo and its service offerings, visit us at www.infomineo.com.

Resumen de la empresa:
The HARTING Technology Group is skilled in the fields of electrical, electronic and optical connection, transmission and networking, as well as in manufacturing, mechatronics and software creation. The Group uses these skills to develop customized solutions and products such as connectors for energy and data transmission applications including, for example, mechanical engineering, rail technology, wind energy plants, factory automation and the telecommunications sector.

HARTING also produces electromagnetic components for the automotive industry, and is a specialist in industrial applications in the form of enclosures, housings, cabling and/or the assembly of individual or complete systems, as well as automated vending systems.

Ayudamos a las personas con sus problemas y uso de las tecnologías digitales de cualquier ámbito (tecnología del hogar digital, tecnología corporativa, productos y servicios), proporcionándoles soporte y asistencia de alta calidad.

Nos dirigimos principalmente a grandes colectivos (seguros, banca, distribución, educación, asistencia, retail, industria y energía), y contamos con una división de gestión de infraestructuras IT donde también damos servicio a Pymes.

Nuestros canales de actuación son, en remoto/contact center las 24 horas del día por teléfono, chat, control remoto, redes sociales y mensajería instantánea, asistencia In-situ en España y Latinoamérica.

La plantilla la formamos 500 personas (datos 2020). Somos un equipo al que le apasionan los retos, el largo plazo en las relaciones y la innovación en el método.
Sector de la empresa: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI

Resumen de la empresa:
Beyond is the #1 Revenue Management Platform for short-term rental owners and managers to get, grow, and keep revenue. Our easy-to-use platform includes a dynamic, demand-driven pricing tool with extensive market data that pairs with OTA distribution and a best-in-class booking engine. 

But we are so much more than that.

We are innovators. We are a leader in the short-term rental industry, building products that help property managers and small business owners to be successful.  We set out to fill a real need in the industry, and we have organized our entire company such that our success hinges on our customers’ success.   

We are results-oriented. We take pride in what we accomplish. We set transparent goals that we share out across the company, and we work tirelessly to smash them. We encourage Beyonders to grow by setting individual career goals, and we support everyone on their journey to meet those goals.  

We are people first. We would not be successful without the brilliant people that have helped us to get to where we are today. We have a global workforce that is proud of their diversity of experiences, demographics and backgrounds.  We believe that creating an environment where people can feel comfortable to be themselves also empowers them to perform at their best.  

We are values-driven. We have five core values that provide structure for our company decisions, interactions, and work:  We Care, We Go Beyond, We Are On The Same Team, We Inspire Trust and We Ship It.  If these values resonate with you, then you Belong at Beyond too.   

To date, we've supported over 340,000 properties in more than 7,500 cities worldwide and have enabled billions of dollars in booking revenue.

Founded in 2013, Beyond is headquartered in San Francisco. To learn more, visit beyondpricing.com
Especialidad de la Empresa: vacation rentals, revenue management, short-term rentals, dynamic pricing y airbnb pricing tool

Resumen de la empresa:
En Omnios ofrecemos soluciones basadas en Inteligencia Artificial para dar respuesta a retos de negocio reales, extrayendo y analizando información desestructurada. Automatizamos los procesos repetitivos de tratamiento de la información para mejorar el resultado de la empresa.

Implementamos nuestro software en empresas de sectores muy diversos, pero todas tienen un punto en común, buscan ser más eficientes en el tratamiento de la información. Con nuestros algoritmos de Natural Language Processing (NLP) aceleramos y estandarizamos la toma de decisiones y el tratamiento de la información. 

Nuestro objetivo es reducir el tiempo de búsqueda y de análisis de la información, permitiendo a nuestros clientes mejorar la eficiencia y la eficacia de las decisiones que toman.

-Desarrollo de plataformas de software a medida a base de AI.

-Examina grandes cantidades de datos no estructurados, como videos, PDF, sitios web y noticias.

-Monitoriza los datos del sector a tiempo real.

-Soporte en la toma de decisiones a partir del análisis de los datos.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Artificial Intelligence, Consulting, Knowledge Management, Digitalization, Cognitive Software, Cognitive Solutions, Big Data, Software Development, Enterprise Solutions, Data Analytics y Business Intelligence

Resumen de la empresa:
Aquila Capital is an investment and asset development company focused on generating and managing essential assets on behalf of its clients. By investing in clean energy and sustainable infrastructure, Aquila Capital contributes to the global energy transition and strengthens the world’s infrastructure backbone. The company initiates, develops, and manages essential assets along the entire value chain and lifetime. Currently, Aquila Capital manages EUR 13.2 billion on behalf of institutional investors worldwide. Our primary objective is to generate performance for our clients by managing the complexity of essential assets.
Established in 2001, Aquila Capital is founder- and partner-owned. The shareholders are backed by a minority stake of Daiwa, one of the largest Asian investors. Over the last two decades, Aquila Capital and its subsidiaries explored, projected, and engaged in meaningful trends for mankind and our planet. 
Today, the company manages wind, solar and hydropower energy assets of 11.1 GW capacity. Additionally, 1.7 million square metres of sustainable real estate and green logistics projects have been completed or are under development. Aquila Capital also invests in energy efficiency, timber, and data centres. Aquila Capital has been carbon neutral since 2006. Sustainability has always been part of our value system and is an integral part of our investment strategies, processes, and management of our assets. The company has around 630 employees from 48 nations, operating in 16 offices in 15 countries worldwide.

M47 Labs places quality at the center of everything we do. Our drive and focus is on creating and ensuring that a first class, innovative and customized solution is provided to our clients.

Derivado de la necesidad de innovar y ser adaptable en el interior del mercado cosmético dinámico y rápidamente cambiante , LipoTrue Ciencia y Biotecnologías se ha adelantado. Esta nueva compañía se mueve un paso adelante en el mundo de las tecnologías para el desarrollo de nuevos principios activos mediante la aplicación de procesos tecnológicos conocidos , que actualmente se utilizan en la asistencia sanitaria con éxito, para reorientar la forma en que pensamos acerca de los cosméticos .

El uso de plantas naturales como biofactorias para la síntesis de proteínas humanas , Big Data Analytics, diseño in silico de nuevos péptidos y bio-investigación marina son las plataformas de alta tecnología que LipoTrue gestiona para la rápida generación de los siguientes ingredientes activos .

Open Evidence is a research and consulting firm delivering theory-based and empirically robust practical insights for informed decision-making in a wide variety of areas. Open Evidence works in the domain of applied research and consulting, based on analytical approaches that include Social and Behavioural Sciences and Data Science.

Open Evidence provides high quality evidence and practical support to the public sector at EU, national and regional level. Our track record includes a long-term history of projects conducted for a several institutions, including the European Commission, the European Parliament and different European agencies and national governments. In addition, Open Evidence is working for multiple private clients from different sectors.

Born as a spin-off of Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (UOC), Open Evidence is now a fully independent organization owned by its partners. Our team is formed by professors, researchers and data scientists with more than 20 years of experience in applied research and consultancy, working from our two offices in Barcelona (Spain) and Milan (Italy).

NUESTRO COMPROMISO ES CON TU ÉXITO

Aplicamos las tecnologías digitales más innovadoras a fin de ofrecerles a nuestros clientes valor en el campo de la arquitectura, la ingeniería y la construcción en diferentes sectores.

Así, nos convertimos en el mejor aliado de diseñadores, constructores y gestores para el aumento de su competitivdad a través del uso de softwares basados en tecnología BIM, diseño computacional y realidad virtual.

SIGMA arose from the interest of various universities in bringing together the needs of data management and administrative procedures and turning them into a set of modules that provide solutions to emerging and changing problems in the university environment.

Reflex Leads is a lead generation company. 

We’re part of Reflex Mediagroup, founded in 2014 in London which built its reputation in digital marketing, traffic generation and affiliation. 

Based in sunny Barcelona, Reflex Leads specializes in performance based lead generation. 
What’s this? Well, we generate high intent leads for our clients and grow their business. We manage everything for them: campaign creation, landing pages and lead distribution via our proprietary technology. 
Our clients pay only for the leads we send them. 
So far we’ve helped thousands of companies to scale their business by sending warm leads right to their sales people. 

We work with companies of all sizes and we’ve shown impressive results in several verticals such as Home Improvements, Insurance, Healthcare, Senior, Telco, Energy… In France, Spain, Italy, UK, Benelux and DACH markets. 

Apart from that, we’re a scale up, privately held. We're like a small family filled with many expats. We like to spend time together, either from the coolest office in Barcelona (ours) or remotely. We’re kinda flexible on that point. 
We do many team gatherings, parties and travels. 

We’re always looking for new talents to join our tribe and take part in our constant growth. Design, Sales, Programming, Acquisition, Data Analysis, HR... Do not hesitate to reach out to us, we’ll be happy to talk.

SISCOG is focused on the optimisation of resources, namely time and space, vehicles, staff and natural resources.

And that focus has guided us for more than 30 years in creating decision-support solutions for the planning and management of resources in the most efficient and sustainable way, guaranteeing our clients better decisions, better operations, higher production, and better quality of their offer.

Using a combination of Artificial Intelligence and Operations Research techniques, the SISCOG Suite is composed of ONTIME, for creating and updating timetables, FLEET, for scheduling and management of vehicles and CREWS, for scheduling and management of staff.

Amongst our clients are renowned companies, such as the VIA Rail Canada, DSB the Danish Railways, NS the Netherlands Railways, VR the Finnish Railways, VY the Norwegian Railways, FGC the Suburban Trains of Catalonia, MEDWAY the Portuguese Freight Railways, the Lisbon Metro and London Underground.

OPTIMISING THE RESOURCES OF THE WORLD

Resumen de la empresa: InnovMetric es una empresa independiente de desarrollo de software que empodera a los fabricantes de todos los tamaños para transformar digitalmente sus procesos de medición 3D. InnovMetric revolucionó la metrología 3D con la introducción de la inspección dimensional basada en nubes de puntos en el año 2000 y el concepto de una plataforma de software de metrología 3D universal en 2006. Hoy en día, con más de 17.000 clientes en 98 países y gracias a que los fabricantes industriales más grandes del mundo han adoptado las soluciones de PolyWorks® como su plataforma de software de metrología 3D estándar, InnovMetric se enfoca en la creación de tecnologías de gestión de procesos y datos digitales de próxima generación. Con sede en la ciudad de Quebec, Canadá, InnovMetric es una organización multinacional con 500 empleados dedicados a llevar los datos de medición 3D al centro de los procesos de ingeniería de su empresa.

Resumen de la empresa:
Soñamos con un mundo digital en el que podamos confiar. Desde el comienzo de Trusted Shops, en 1999, trabajamos para ello, para asegurar que todos podamos tomar las mejores decisiones en un mundo cada vez más digitalizado. Empezamos con nuestro Sello de Calidad que incluía la Protección al Comprador, para una mayor orientación y seguridad real al comprar online. Hoy en día, nuestro sistema de valoraciones se encarga además de ofrecer transparencia real en todos los sectores, mucho más allá del comercio electrónico.
 

Un equipo de expertos, todas las libertades para trabajar

El valor más importante de nuestra empresa es la confianza. Esto también significa, por supuesto, que confiamos los unos en los otros y nos tratamos con benevolencia. Todo el equipo de más de 700 personas nos esforzamos por el mismo resulado: que nuestros clientes, partners y compañeros estén contentos. Para lograrlo, trabajamos juntos con pasión, dedicación y mucha diversión. No importa desde donde trabaje cada individuo, ya sea desde una de nuestras 6 oficinas en Europa, desde su casa o donde mejor le convenga.

Trusted Shops conecta a la gente, las marcas y las organizaciones. Conéctate con nosotros y usa tus habilidades para hacer del mundo un lugar mejor.

Your progress is our demand: As pioneers of the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) we offer you application-specific automation solutions. We support you in mastering your technological challenges. As a specialist in smart sensor technology and decentralized automation, Turck brings intelligence to machines and ensures reliable detection, transmission and processing of relevant production data – from sensor to cloud – not only with robust I/O solutions in IP67, but also with user-friendly software and services.

Somos una empresa joven que busca impulsar el desarrollo tecnológico en pequeños y medianos negocios. Nuestro principal objetivo es hacer crecer este tipo de empresas. 

StockAgile es la herramienta específica de retail para marcas, mayoristas y minoristas para automatizar y optimizar todas sus operaciones en una sola plataforma.

Esta herramienta permite analizar el ciclo de vida del producto, desde que es diseñado o comprado, hasta que es vendido al cliente final, ofreciendo una experiencia de compra omnicanal. Además, elimina la complejidad de elegir qué producto diseñar o comprar, elegir la tienda adecuada para incrementar sus ventas, o encontrar un equilibrio entre existencias y promociones.

StockAgile utiliza minería de datos y algoritmos de inteligencia artificial para crear modelos predictivos que aumenten las ventas, a través de la asignación asistida de inventario, aprovisionamiento automático y a la optimización de roturas de stock.

Entre múltiples funcionalidades, el producto ofrece la gestión de la fabricación, la gestión del inventario y almacenes, la gestión de la venta al por mayor, la gestión del punto de venta para tiendas y la sincronización con ecommerce.

Vitaance ayuda a las personas a vivir más y mejor. Nuestro producto combina un seguro de vida y accidentes para empresas con una plataforma de bienestar 360° para sus empleados. 

De esta manera, las empresas pueden ofrecer un beneficio clave a sus empleados como es el seguro de vida, que no solo les protege, si no que les ayuda a vivir mejor cada día y a conectar más con sus compañeros de trabajo. Esto lo hacemos a través de un innovador sistema de retos y recompensas.

🏆 Retos: Les propondremos retos individuales y por equipos, enfocados en mejorar su bienestar en las diferentes áreas: Físico, mental, social y financiero. Por ejemplo, ¿qué equipo camina más pasos en total durante un mes? 

🎁 Recompensas: Al completar los retos, ganan recompensas y premios de otras marcas de bienestar asociadas, tales como masajes gratis, suscripciones al gimnasio, productos de belleza, etc... haciendo así que la motivación sea doble.

¿Quieres motivar a tus empleados y darles un beneficio que utilizarán todos los días? Esto es Vitaance.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Life insurance, Health, Lifestyle, Data, Technology y Distribution

Resumen de la empresa: SAUTER is the world's leading solution provider for building automation technology in "Green Buildings", ensuring good climate conditions and well-being in living spaces with a future. As a specialist, SAUTER develops, produces and sells products and systems for energy-efficient overall solutions and ensures the energy-optimized operation of buildings with comprehensive services. Our products, solutions and services enable high energy efficiency throughout the entire building life cycle. This extends from planning through implementation to operation in office and administration buildings, research and educational facilities, hospitals, industrial and laboratory buildings, airports, leisure facilities, hotels and data centers. With over 100 years of experience and proven technological competence, SAUTER is a proven system integrator that guarantees continuous innovation and Swiss quality. SAUTER provides both users and operators with an overview of energy flows and consumption, and thus also of cost trends. Today, we regard buildings as complex living spaces that should be carefully integrated into nature and in harmony with it: - Systems - Components - Service - Facility management

Founded in 2011, Roamler provides businesses with B2B crowd-based solutions, answering the call of companies for efficiency with widespread, on-demand professionals and individuals. These 'Roamlers' are recruited, trained, and organized according to their skills, experience, and location, and then matched to 'tasks'.

Roamler is the European leader in crowd-supported field-marketing activities, performing tasks for the biggest FMCG manufacturers, consumer brands, PCGs, and retail chains.

Since 2016, Roamler is also active in crowd-supported technical solutions such as installations, service and repairs, executed by a network of certified professionals spread across the Netherlands, the UK and Germany.

In 2018, Roamler launched the first-ever venture to increase flexibility and efficiency in the home care and healthcare industries, by leveraging the power of a large network of professional caregivers active across the Netherlands.

In 2020, Roamler received a 20M euros funding from Endeit Capital, Smartfin and Achmea Innovation Fund and ranked among the top three fastest-growing scale-ups in Europe.

In March 2021, Roamler acquired Datlinq, data company specialized in foodservice and food retail data, with the purpose of enabling its clients to build a fully data-driven route- to- market also in the out-of-home channel.

In October 2021, through its Retail division, Roamler has acquired Mobeye, strong French player in crowd-supported field marketing services for businesses; with the goal of further expanding its commercial proposition to FMCGs and retailers, while consolidating a leadership position also in the French market.

Sign up to our monthly newsletter to receive the latest insights, innovations,
and opportunities when it comes to flexible resourcing for businesses! https://campaign.roamler.com/newsletter
Especialidad de la Empresa: Information Technology, Mobile Applications, Field Marketing, Home installations, Market research y Flexible Resourcing
