Resumen de la empresa: Hornetsecurity es un proveedor líder de servicios gestionados de seguridad. Nuestros productos se encargan de brindarle una comunicación segura a su servicio de correo electrónico. Los servicios gestionados de seguridad, se encuentran a la disposición inmediata, no necesitan de ningún software y/o hardware adicional y tampoco requieren ningún esfuerzo de mantenimiento. Nuestras soluciones son compatibles con todos los servidores y sistemas de correo conocidos, y se generan de manera centralizada, a través de distintos centros de datos – 24 horas al día, 7 días a la semana, 365 días al año. Día a día, a cualquier hora filtramos y archivamos millones de emails para empresas de todos los tamaños, así como a organizaciones, ofreciéndole una comunicación electrónica segura – garantizada.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Information Security Solutions, Managed Email Security, Web Filtering, Email Archiving, Email Continuity Service, Solutions for SMBs, Spam Filter Service, Advanced Threat Protection (ATP), Data Security, Email Encryption, Data Encryption, Spam Filtering, SIEM Services, Microsoft Office 365 Protection, Awareness Training, Microsoft 365 Security, Backup, Compliance, Cloud Security, Ransomware Protection, Malware Protection y Phishing Protection

Resumen de la empresa:
TERRITORY ist ein Kommunikationsunternehmen, das Agenturgeschäft und eigene digitale Produkte vereint. An sieben deutschen und fünf europäischen Standorten arbeiten unsere Mitarbeiter:innen daran, Marken, Unternehmen und Institutionen spezifische Lösungen für alle Felder moderner Kommunikation anzubieten. Bei TERRITORY glauben wir an starke Strategie und überzeugende Konzeption, mutige Kreation und echte Geschichten, an smarte Technologie und mediale Kraft. Die flexible Netzwerkorganisation besteht aus der Kommunikationsagentur TERRITORY, die Kompetenzbereiche wie Storytelling & Journalism, Strategie, Design, Campaigns & Brand, Audio & Video, Influencer Marketing, Video & Audio, PR & Experiences bis hin zu Tech & Data sowie Webservices vereint; TERRITORY Media als Full-Service Media-Agentur, die Media und Performance vernetzt; sowie TERRITORY Embrace als Agentur für Employer Branding, Recruiting und Personalmarketing mit eigenen digitalen Plattformen wie Ausbildung.de oder MeinPraktikum.de. Das Unternehmen ist Teil von Bertelsmann und hat seinen Hauptsitz in Hamburg.

WHO WE ARE
We create video technology software that helps people understand what they are looking at - in security and beyond.

We find information in video data that people can act on:
– Either to revisit things that happened in the past
– Or to see things in real-time
– and soon we will be able to see things before they actually happen.
In other words, we make the world see.

MILESTONE AS AN EMPLOYER
When joining Milestone, you will be part of the world’s leading provider of IP Video Management Systems. Since our start in Denmark in 1998, we have grown to over 1.000 employees across development centers and regional offices in more than 25 countries. Today, our solutions are used in 500,000+ installations worldwide – with many more to come.

We believe, that our success first and foremost is based on our sworn dedication to put people first – the people we work with and the people around us. It's how we grow our culture, our business, and our community. We want to blaze new trails, stay curious and push the industry standard. Investing in people is how we do it. Because at Milestone, we grow together. Are you ready to grow your career, then visit milestone.com/careers

PRIVACY POLICY
Milestone has always been a strong proponent of safety and security – especially when it comes to that of the individual. We take privacy concerns very seriously and do our utmost to be transparent about how we store and use data. As a consequence, we salute the GDPR initiative and its ambition to safeguard personal privacy. For further information on how we handle and use data, please see our privacy policy at: https://www.milestonesys.com/privacy-policy.
Especialidad de la Empresa: IP Video Surveillance Software y Video Management Software

Preply is a global language learning marketplace, connecting 50,000+ tutors with millions of learners from all over the world. Since the company launched in 2012, students have signed up to more than 15 million lessons.

Backed by some of the world’s leading investors, Preply is on a mission to shape the future of effective learning. Fueled by a belief that live engagement with a teacher is still the most effective way to learn a new skill, Preply is building a personalized learning space that will enable individual learners to reach their goals in the fastest way possible.

Powered by a tenfold increase in revenues over the last three years, Preply is now leading the online language tutoring segment globally and has 400+ employees of over 50 nationalities based across Barcelona, Kyiv, and the US. Preply is driven by a culture of experimentation and data-driven learnings focused on building best-in-class consumer and enterprise solutions.

Sollers Consulting is an international operational advisory and software integrator. Established in 2000, the company supports insurers, banks, and leasing firms in business transformations and adapting to modern technologies. We are a worldwide provider of ground displacement (slope stability, subsidence, uplift, heave, etc.) measurements using satellite radar data. We produce high quality and reliable measurements for Mining, Oil & Gas and Infrastructure companies to contribute to safety and cost efficiency in operations. 

DARES TECHNOLOGY is known for its unique measurement reliability and for our service excellence, with continuous innovation to offer always the latest technology. We are proud of our extraordinary team, formed by globally recognized highly skilled radar, GIS and geological experts. Thanks to our broad experience we provide optimal solutions to solve our clients’ needs and challenges. Our headquarters are based in Spain with delegations in Chile, United States, Canada, Australia and Turkey. Some of our client references include ESA, EU, Abertis, Airbus, Glencore, AngloAmerican, Codelco, Total, World Bank, Government of Spain, Origin Energy, KGHM, NewCrest, Sibelco, NewMomt, Southern, Rio Tinto, TECK and BHP.

Resumen de la empresa:
STADA es un socio de confianza orientado fundamentalmente al cuidado de la salud de las personas. Para conseguir este objetivo dedicamos nuestros esfuerzos a seguir acelerando la trayectoria de éxito de nuestra empresa.

STADA es un fabricante líder de medicamentos de alta calidad. Con una larga tradición que se remonta a las antiguas farmacias, gozamos desde hace más de 120 años de una buena reputación como socios seguros y fiables. Con nuestros productos ayudamos a las personas a mantener y recuperar una vida sana y digna de ser vivida. Nuestros genéricos de eficacia probada contribuyen a conseguir que el cuidado diario de la salud sea asequible. Ofrecemos a nuestros empleados un atractivo entorno de trabajo en el que se fomenta el desarrollo personal.
STADA Arzneimittel AG vende sus productos en aproximadamente 120 países de todo el mundo. Algunos de nuestros productos de marca como Grippostad, Aqualor, Snup y Ladival se encuentran entre los más vendidos de su categoría. En el ejercicio de 2020, STADA alcanzó unas ventas ajustadas de grupo de 3.010,3 millones de euros y unos ingresos ajustados antes de intereses, impuestos, depreciaciones y amortizaciones (EBITDA) de 713,3 millones de euros. A 31 de diciembre de 2020, STADA contaba con una plantilla de 12.301 personas en todo el mundo.  

¿Está buscando una interesante oportunidad laboral que le permita avanzar en su carrera profesional dentro del sector farmacéutico? Consulte nuestras ofertas de empleo en: www.stada.com/career

Política de protección de datos y pie de imprenta: www.stada.com/data-protection, www.stada.com/imprint
Especialidad de la Empresa: Pharmaceuticals, Health Care, Generics, Consumer Health y Biopharmaceuticals

Resumen de la empresa:
We are a dynamic and forward-thinking firm that operates across a wide range of industries. With our multidisciplinary teams, we create bold strategies and innovative solutions tailored to our client's needs as we enable them to capitalise on opportunities. Together we strive to bring long-lasting impact and celebrate collective victories. At Metyis, our work environment unifies creative problem-solving and strategic thinking. We provide resources to visionaries who understand the direction that the world is moving. Tomorrow's world is data-driven, digital and international.
 
Our selection of services stands to equip clients with the knowledge and tools to maximise their potential. Strategies are designed with a long-term vision and targets are set with a clear direction to drive continuous progress. EPLAN provides software and service solutions in the fields of electrical, automation and mechatronic engineering. The company develops one of the world’s leading design software solutions for machine and panel builders. EPLAN is also the ideal partner to streamline challenging engineering processes. 
Both standardised as well as customised interfaces to ERP and PLM/PDM systems ensure data consistency along the whole value chain. Working with EPLAN means boundless communication across all engineering disciplines. No matter whether small or large enterprises: Customers can apply their expertise more efficiently. Worldwide, EPLAN supports more than 65,000 customers. EPLAN wants to grow further with customers and partners and pushes integration and automation in engineering forward. Within the EPLAN Partner Network, open interfaces and seamless integrations are realised together with partners. „Efficient engineering“ is the focus.
EPLAN was founded in 1984 and is part of the owner-operated Friedhelm Loh Group. The Friedhelm Loh Group operates worldwide with more than 12 production sites and over 90 international subsidiaries. The entire group employs more than 11.600 people and generated revenues of €2,5 billion in 2021. For the 14th time in succession, the family business has won the accolade “Top German Employer” in 2022. In addition, Friedhelm Loh Group was recognized as “Top vocational trainer” according to a study of Deutschland Test and Focus Money.

IT'S ABOUT HUMANS

Our mission is to improve the health of individuals and populations in resource-poor countries through advanced AI applications.

benshi.ai focuses on providing powerful, personalized, data-driven insights to medical care teams and individual patients. We build machine learning products to benefit real-life communities.

Our passionate team of scientists, engineers, and creative minds works closely with our partners to push the frontiers of AI and global health. We are a non-profit funded by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

We are a global workplace strategy, design, and construction leader creating experiential spaces for a rapidly changing world.  

We believe our spaces should spark brilliance in people who use them. Together as One Team, we create environments that deepen connections, foster a sense of belonging and propel success. 

As we knock down the barriers between strategy, design, and construction, we deliver our projects on meaningful timeframes, collaborate free of egos, and strive for excellence across all aspects of our work, without sacrificing any one discipline. 

We are a global partner, driven by data and real-world insights, and we honor local culture everywhere we work.

WHO WE ARE

Do you love learning? Does the idea of working for an EdTech company that was born in Silicon Valley and has offices in Barcelona and San Francisco excite you? Then Edpuzzle might just be your perfect fit.


Used in over 50% of schools in the USA, Edpuzzle makes it easy for teachers to engage their students with interactive video lessons.


We’re a small team of talented creatives (many of us former teachers) who got our start back in 2013 at ImagineK12, the first education incubator in the USA and now part of Y Combinator, where Airbnb and Dropbox were born. We have fantastic support from our teachers and investors, who allow us to continue growing our Edpuzzle community every day.


WHAT WE DO

We empower teachers to make any video their lesson with our easy-to-use video editing tools and beautiful, hassle-free analytics showing students’ results. In just a few clicks, teachers can turn any video into an engaging and effective lesson, and then see in real time which students understood the lesson and who needs help, thanks to the insightful student data Edpuzzle gathers.

WHY WE DO IT

We dream of a day where every teacher and student will be just a click away from an excellent online education, and we’re working to turn it into a reality. Together with the teachers in our Edpuzzle community, we’re creating a pool of incredible quality, inspiring video lessons for the classroom.
Especialidad de la Empresa: video-editing, formative assessment, tracking, flipped classroom, education y edtech

Retail Rocket is an all-in-1 Retention Management Platform.
We help solve three main tasks: make high-end marketing technologies easier to use for marketers, improve marketing efficiency for the business and make marketing actually useful for your customers. The platform has everything your business needs to grow LTV and generate repeat sales based on Big Data: 

— empower your business with CDP and store all the data you need to build marketing campaigns in Data Warehouse module
— segment your customer database using smart mathematical models available in our Customer Intelligence module
— develop efficient marketing communications for key customer segments across email, web / mobile push, SMS and other channels with Campaign Management System
— personalise every step of the customer journey via our AI Personalization Engine


Retail Rocket is a global company with a team of more than 20 different nationalities active in Europe since 2016. Since our foundation in 2012, we have successfully completed over 1000 projects all around the world. The European HQ is located in The Hague (Netherlands) and we have offices in Barcelona (Spain) and Berlin (Germany). Our data warehouse is securely located in Germany. Retail Rocket has also offices in Latin America and Asia. The company is owned by a European investment group.

Infomineo allows its clients to focus on their core activities by outsourcing support activities which require judgment and critical thinking (hence brain-shoring) to locations where they would not operate otherwise (currently Casablanca and Cairo, and Mexico city soon). To guarantee the best return on investment to our clients we operate on a retainer basis.

We help our clients access insights which are critical for decision making (our research service), access expertise (our expert network), translate business concepts (our translation service) and represent data in a beautiful and creative way (our design services).

Infomineo serves all the leading global consulting firms, and now more than 50 of the Fortune 500 companies.

Infomineo is ISO 27001 certified (Information Security)

The HARTING Technology Group is skilled in the fields of electrical, electronic and optical connection, transmission and networking, as well as in manufacturing, mechatronics and software creation. The Group uses these skills to develop customized solutions and products such as connectors for energy and data transmission applications including, for example, mechanical engineering, rail technology, wind energy plants, factory automation and the telecommunications sector.

HARTING also produces electromagnetic components for the automotive industry, and is a specialist in industrial applications in the form of enclosures, housings, cabling and/or the assembly of individual or complete systems, as well as automated vending systems.

Ayudamos a las personas con sus problemas y uso de las tecnologías digitales de cualquier ámbito (tecnología del hogar digital, tecnología corporativa, productos y servicios), proporcionándoles soporte y asistencia de alta calidad.

Nos dirigimos principalmente a grandes colectivos (seguros, banca, distribución, educación, asistencia, retail, industria y energía), y contamos con una división de gestión de infraestructuras IT donde también damos servicio a Pymes.

Nuestros canales de actuación son, en remoto/contact center las 24 horas del día por teléfono, chat, control remoto, redes sociales y mensajería instantánea, asistencia In-situ en España y Latinoamérica.

La plantilla la formamos 500 personas (datos 2020). Somos un equipo al que le apasionan los retos, el largo plazo en las relaciones y la innovación en el método.

Resumen de la empresa:
Beyond is the #1 Revenue Management Platform for short-term rental owners and managers to get, grow, and keep revenue. Our easy-to-use platform includes a dynamic, demand-driven pricing tool with extensive market data that pairs with OTA distribution and a best-in-class booking engine. 

But we are so much more than that.

We are innovators. We are a leader in the short-term rental industry, building products that help property managers and small business owners to be successful.  We set out to fill a real need in the industry, and we have organized our entire company such that our success hinges on our customers’ success.   

We are results-oriented. We take pride in what we accomplish. We set transparent goals that we share out across the company, and we work tirelessly to smash them. We encourage Beyonders to grow by setting individual career goals, and we support everyone on their journey to meet those goals.  

We are people first. We would not be successful without the brilliant people that have helped us to get to where we are today. We have a global workforce that is proud of their diversity of experiences, demographics and backgrounds.  We believe that creating an environment where people can feel comfortable to be themselves also empowers them to perform at their best.  

We are values-driven. We have five core values that provide structure for our company decisions, interactions, and work:  We Care, We Go Beyond, We Are On The Same Team, We Inspire Trust and We Ship It.  If these values resonate with you, then you Belong at Beyond too.   

To date, we've supported over 340,000 properties in more than 7,500 cities worldwide and have enabled billions of dollars in booking revenue.

Founded in 2013, Beyond is headquartered in San Francisco. To learn more, visit beyondpricing.com
Especialidad de la Empresa: vacation rentals, revenue management, short-term rentals, dynamic pricing y airbnb pricing tool

Resumen de la empresa:
En Omnios ofrecemos soluciones basadas en Inteligencia Artificial para dar respuesta a retos de negocio reales, extrayendo y analizando información desestructurada. Automatizamos los procesos repetitivos de tratamiento de la información para mejorar el resultado de la empresa.

Implementamos nuestro software en empresas de sectores muy diversos, pero todas tienen un punto en común, buscan ser más eficientes en el tratamiento de la información. Con nuestros algoritmos de Natural Language Processing (NLP) aceleramos y estandarizamos la toma de decisiones y el tratamiento de la información. 

Nuestro objetivo es reducir el tiempo de búsqueda y de análisis de la información, permitiendo a nuestros clientes mejorar la eficiencia y la eficacia de las decisiones que toman.

-Desarrollo de plataformas de software a medida a base de AI.

-Examina grandes cantidades de datos no estructurados, como videos, PDF, sitios web y noticias.

-Monitoriza los datos del sector a tiempo real.

-Soporte en la toma de decisiones a partir del análisis de los datos.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Artificial Intelligence, Consulting, Knowledge Management, Digitalization, Cognitive Software, Cognitive Solutions, Big Data, Software Development, Enterprise Solutions, Data Analytics y Business Intelligence

Resumen de la empresa:
Aquila Capital is an investment and asset development company focused on generating and managing essential assets on behalf of its clients. By investing in clean energy and sustainable infrastructure, Aquila Capital contributes to the global energy transition and strengthens the world’s infrastructure backbone. The company initiates, develops, and manages essential assets along the entire value chain and lifetime. Currently, Aquila Capital manages EUR 13.2 billion on behalf of institutional investors worldwide. Our primary objective is to generate performance for our clients by managing the complexity of essential assets.
Established in 2001, Aquila Capital is founder- and partner-owned. The shareholders are backed by a minority stake of Daiwa, one of the largest Asian investors. Over the last two decades, Aquila Capital and its subsidiaries explored, projected, and engaged in meaningful trends for mankind and our planet. 
Today, the company manages wind, solar and hydropower energy assets of 11.1 GW capacity. Additionally, 1.7 million square metres of sustainable real estate and green logistics projects have been completed or are under development. Aquila Capital also invests in energy efficiency, timber, and data centres. Aquila Capital has been carbon neutral since 2006. Sustainability has always been part of our value system and is an integral part of our investment strategies, processes, and management of our assets. The company has around 630 employees from 48 nations, operating in 16 offices in 15 countries worldwide.

M47 Labs places quality at the center of everything we do. Our drive and focus is on creating and ensuring that a first class, innovative and customized solution is provided to our clients.

Esta nueva compañía se mueve un paso adelante en el mundo de las tecnologías para el desarrollo de nuevos principios activos mediante la aplicación de procesos tecnológicos conocidos , que actualmente se utilizan en la asistencia sanitaria con éxito, para reorientar la forma en que pensamos acerca de los cosméticos .

El uso de plantas naturales como biofactorias para la síntesis de proteínas humanas , Big Data Analytics, diseño in silico de nuevos péptidos y bio-investigación marina son las plataformas de alta tecnología que LipoTrue gestiona para la rápida generación de los siguientes ingredientes activos .

Open Evidence is a research and consulting firm delivering theory-based and empirically robust practical insights for informed decision-making in a wide variety of areas. Open Evidence works in the domain of applied research and consulting, based on analytical approaches that include Social and Behavioural Sciences and Data Science.

Open Evidence provides high quality evidence and practical support to the public sector at EU, national and regional level. Our track record includes a long-term history of projects conducted for a several institutions, including the European Commission, the European Parliament and different European agencies and national governments. In addition, Open Evidence is working for multiple private clients from different sectors.

Born as a spin-off of Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (UOC), Open Evidence is now a fully independent organization owned by its partners. Our team is formed by professors, researchers and data scientists with more than 20 years of experience in applied research and consultancy, working from our two offices in Barcelona (Spain) and Milan (Italy).

NUESTRO COMPROMISO ES CON TU ÉXITO

Aplicamos las tecnologías digitales más innovadoras a fin de ofrecerles a nuestros clientes valor en el campo de la arquitectura, la ingeniería y la construcción en diferentes sectores.

Así, nos convertimos en el mejor aliado de diseñadores, constructores y gestores para el aumento de su competitivdad a través del uso de softwares basados en tecnología BIM, diseño computacional y realidad virtual.

Reflex Leads is a lead generation company.

We work with companies of all sizes and we’ve shown impressive results in several verticals such as Home Improvements, Insurance, Healthcare, Senior, Telco, Energy… In France, Spain, Italy, UK, Benelux and DACH markets. 

Apart from that, we’re a scale up, privately held. We're like a small family filled with many expats. We like to spend time together, either from the coolest office in Barcelona (ours) or remotely. We’re kinda flexible on that point. 
We do many team gatherings, parties and travels. 

We’re always looking for new talents to join our tribe and take part in our constant growth. Design, Sales, Programming, Acquisition, Data Analysis, HR... Do not hesitate to reach out to us, we’ll be happy to talk.

SISCOG is focused on the optimisation of resources, namely time and space, vehicles, staff and natural resources.

And that focus has guided us for more than 30 years in creating decision-support solutions for the planning and management of resources in the most efficient and sustainable way, guaranteeing our clients better decisions, better operations, higher production, and better quality of their offer.

Using a combination of Artificial Intelligence and Operations Research techniques, the SISCOG Suite is composed of ONTIME, for creating and updating timetables, FLEET, for scheduling and management of vehicles and CREWS, for scheduling and management of staff.

Amongst our clients are renowned companies, such as the VIA Rail Canada, DSB the Danish Railways, NS the Netherlands Railways, VR the Finnish Railways, VY the Norwegian Railways, FGC the Suburban Trains of Catalonia, MEDWAY the Portuguese Freight Railways, the Lisbon Metro and London Underground.

OPTIMISING THE RESOURCES OF THE WORLD

Un equipo de expertos, todas las libertades para trabajar

Vitaance ayuda a las personas a vivir más y mejor. Nuestro producto combina un seguro de vida y accidentes para empresas con una plataforma de bienestar 360° para sus empleados. 

De esta manera, las empresas pueden ofrecer un beneficio clave a sus empleados como es el seguro de vida, que no solo les protege, si no que les ayuda a vivir mejor cada día y a conectar más con sus compañeros de trabajo. Esto lo hacemos a través de un innovador sistema de retos y recompensas.

🏆 Retos: Les propondremos retos individuales y por equipos, enfocados en mejorar su bienestar en las diferentes áreas: Físico, mental, social y financiero. Por ejemplo, ¿qué equipo camina más pasos en total durante un mes? 

🎁 Recompensas: Al completar los retos, ganan recompensas y premios de otras marcas de bienestar asociadas, tales como masajes gratis, suscripciones al gimnasio, productos de belleza, etc... haciendo así que la motivación sea doble.

Resumen de la empresa: SAUTER is the world's leading solution provider for building automation technology in "Green Buildings", ensuring good climate conditions and well-being in living spaces with a future. With over 100 years of experience and proven technological competence, SAUTER is a proven system integrator that guarantees continuous innovation and Swiss quality. Founded in 2011, Roamler provides businesses with B2B crowd-based solutions, answering the call of companies for efficiency with widespread, on-demand professionals and individuals. These 'Roamlers' are recruited, trained, and organized according to their skills, experience, and location, and then matched to 'tasks'.

Roamler is the European leader in crowd-supported field-marketing activities, performing tasks for the biggest FMCG manufacturers, consumer brands, PCGs, and retail chains.

Since 2016, Roamler is also active in crowd-supported technical solutions such as installations, service and repairs, executed by a network of certified professionals spread across the Netherlands, the UK and Germany.

In 2018, Roamler launched the first-ever venture to increase flexibility and efficiency in the home care and healthcare industries, by leveraging the power of a large network of professional caregivers active across the Netherlands.

In 2020, Roamler received a 20M euros funding from Endeit Capital, Smartfin and Achmea Innovation Fund and ranked among the top three fastest-growing scale-ups in Europe.

In March 2021, Roamler acquired Datlinq, data company specialized in foodservice and food retail data, with the purpose of enabling its clients to build a fully data-driven route- to- market also in the out-of-home channel.

In October 2021, through its Retail division, Roamler has acquired Mobeye, strong French player in crowd-supported field marketing services for businesses; with the goal of further expanding its commercial proposition to FMCGs and retailers, while consolidating a leadership position also in the French market.

Sign up to our monthly newsletter to receive the latest insights, innovations,
and opportunities when it comes to flexible resourcing for businesses! https://campaign.roamler.com/newsletter
Especialidad de la Empresa: Information Technology, Mobile Applications, Field Marketing, Home installations, Market research y Flexible Resourcing

Kognia Sports Intelligence is a Barcelona-based startup building a next-generation soccer analytics platform. Using proprietary or external video feed from the games, Kognia’s technology automatizes and conducts real-time and post-match tactical analysis of football games
 
Kognia’s software provides feedback directly to coaching staffs in their own language. Coaches are alerted to important tactical situations and given suggestions for exploiting them. Post-match, users can review squad performance and explore a database of training drills based on the detected tactics.
 
Current methods of data analysis have limited practical application for coaches (e.g., surface-level statistics such as heat maps and distance traveled), and despite technology, a coaching staff must still spend many hours doing manual video analysis in order to identify tactical patterns. Kognia’s approach differs from current alternatives because it detects specific, high-level tactical fundamentals that have our team of football experts led by Joan Vilà, former FC Barcelona Director of Methodology and mentor to numerous elite players and coaches such as Xavi Hernández and Carles Puyol.
 
The vision of Kognia goes beyond serving technical staff in Football Clubs. Based on the interpretation of what happens in the field of play, the objective is to offer information 360 degrees, that is, to multiple industry segments and users, including scouting professionals, health condition practitioners, media companies or the Esport segment.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Sports intelligence, software, real time analysis, football analysis, sportech, tactic analysis, artificial intelligence, automatic tactic analysis, user experience, analytical staff, football tactical analysis, automated football analysis, tactical performance analysis, team performance analysis, machine learning, video analysis, software development, football analytical software, automated video anlaysis, big data y coaching assist

Resumen de la empresa:
I-care is a global leader in predictive and prescriptive maintenance. Our AI-powered and data driven solutions predict industrial failures before anyone else. With our innovative methods, products and services, we take care of thousands of assets and processes of clients around the world and we help them reduce risks for safer, more productive, and more sustainable industries. Founded in 2004 and based in Belgium, I-care employs over 500 people and has offices in 26 countries (Europe, USA, and Asia). It was named Business of the Year 2020.

I-care is a responsible partner. We are responsible towards all of our stakeholders and our planet.

Our values are respect for others, performance, and sustainability.

- Respect for others. We deeply care about our people. We strongly believe in and promote equality, diversity, and inclusion. We support each employee and we empower one another. We trust each other and achieve more by working together. We are loyal and honest, and we also know how to have fun.

- Performance. We deeply care about our customers. Exceeding their expectations is our top priority. We help them to be models of efficiency and innovation. Overall, companies that work with us reduce their industrial breakdowns by as much as 95% and increase their site productivity by as much as 30%. We nurture long-term relationships with our clients and have not lost a single one of them since our founding in 2004.
 
- Sustainability. We deeply care about our planet and want to contribute to a more sustainable world. Thanks to I-care solutions and services, industrial assets around the world consume less and pollute less. By improving the operation conditions of our clients’ assets, we also prevent human and environmental disasters. Our development strategy is based on sustainable growth and innovation. We constantly invest in R&D to further improve our technology and have an even greater impact.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Reliability Engineering, Predictive Maintenance, Vibration Diagnostic & Testing, Infrared Thermography, Ultrasound Diagnostic, Wireless sensors, Asset Management, Operational Excellence, RCM, Training, Planning and Scheduling, Wireless Vibration, Shutdown Management, RCL Engineering, Wrench Time Optimisation, Condition Monitoring, Maintenance 4.0, IIoT, Industry 4.0, Oil analysis, Predictive analytics, Machine learning, Artificial intelligence, IoT, IIoT, Measure and Analyze y Asset Failure

Resumen de la empresa:
Taleo is a global independent management and delivery advisory group.

With offices in Luxembourg, Paris, Brussels, Amsterdam, Geneva, Barcelona, Lisbon, and Singapore, we provide our customers with tailored and innovative solutions. From a strategic approach to the operational implementation of projects and systems, we constantly seek to create value.

What makes us special is the combination of a unique blend of industry expertise, top level consultants, best-in-class transformation skills and a unique working culture.

EXPERTISE

Our financial expertise combined with our specialization in risk management, compliance, governance, processes management and financial information systems allow us to deliver best practices as well as tailored and innovative solutions to our clients.

There are five pillars to our activities and interventions:
- Agile Governance & Project Management,
- Business & Operations,
- Processes & Change Management,
- Digital Transformation & Data Management,
- Finance, Risk & Compliance.

Taleo advises its customers with the best talents on the market. We select only highly-skilled professionals who become agile members of their organization and help our clients deliver more than the initial expectations.

VALUES

Our three values, Family, Fun and Excellence are at the core of our day-to-day activities and shape the way we interact with both our collaborators and our partners. We strive for excellence and we meet the target!

CSR

As a United Nations Global Compact company, we have committed to putting Human Rights, Labour, Environment and Anticorruption at the core of our strategies and operations. Taleo has been appointed Great Place to Work and is certified Ecovadis since 2020. We are involved with several NGOs that support women's rights, refugees, children, and sustainability.

JOBS

We are always on the lookout for talented people to enrich our culture and growing family. If you are a candidate, feel free to apply via our website!
Especialidad de la Empresa: Financial Consulting, Compliance, Financial Information Systems, Operational Excellence, Governance, Advisory, Project Management, Change Management y Risk Management

Resumen de la empresa:
Proficio is a world-class Managed Security Service Provider (MSSP) providing managed detection and response solutions, 24×7 security monitoring and advanced data breach prevention services to organizations globally. 

Our rapid growth is being fueled by the rise in cloud-based services, the acceptance of the Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) model, and the increasing number of cyber security attacks on businesses, hospitals and government. We have developed proprietary security content and threat intelligence tools to identify and proactively defend against advanced attacks and insider threats. Proficio’s founders are veterans of the security and networking industry who have helped guide multiple companies to successful exits.
 
Proficio’s customers benefit from the most advanced security monitoring and 24×7 managed security services that until recently were outside the budget of all but the very largest enterprises. Proficio’s ProSOC service offerings include the following:
 • 24×7 security event monitoring, alerting, and remediation
 • Advanced SIEM correlation analysis
 • Protection against complex attacks and insider threats
 • Actionable intelligence that enables internal IT teams to effectively and quickly resolve issues
 • Threat Intelligence 
 • Active Defense that blocks targeted attacks in real time 24×7
 • Worry-free compliance audits for: PCI, HIPAA, SOX, GLBA, FFIEC, NERC CIP, and FISMA regulations
 • Visibility to event logs with easy-to-use web portal, powerful reporting, dashboards, and drill-down analytics
 • Full management of security devices including patching, health and performance monitoring, and tuning
 • Free 12 month log retention
 • Out-of-the-box support for 400+ log sources
• Scalable cloud-based deployment – fast implementation and no software or hardware purchases
• Advanced scanning eliminating vulnerabilities before they can be exploited
Especialidad de la Empresa: Cloud-based Security, Risk, and Compliance, Managed Security Services, SIEM SaaS, Real-time Security Event Monitoring, Managed Firewall, Managed IPS, Managed WAF, Vulnerability Management y Web Application Scanning

Resumen de la empresa:
Impulse4women is an international non-profit organization operating both online and offline. Our vision is to change the world of startup investment distribution based on gender diversity and also social impact led investment. We support, ignite, and connect startups with investors, corporations, and public or private organizations and set them up for success. 

We support at every stage of development providing the required tools and skills to increase the probability of funding, depending of their maturity, sector, allocation, economic needs. 

We want to foster investments in businesses that aim to create economic value in line with the creation of value for the society by addressing its needs and challenges hence promoting greater shared values and social responsibility from the beginning of a company.
We will do that through networking and knowledge sharing events, inspiration by role models and through a web platform to connect a and promote investment in startups with greater gender diversity and shared values.

We believe that gender diversity will lead to superior investment performance. Many studies have established a correlation between gender diversity in senior teams and higher returns on equity in corporations, investment firms and startups. We want to see this happening so ubiquitously that fostering gender diversity ceases to be a necessity.

AG Solution offers its engineering expertise in the world of automation. 

We provide general and entire overview of control & monitoring data from automation (PLC) layer and process control (SCADA) to data management and real-time event using OSISoft PI 

From the physical and PLC, layers, over SCADA and DCS, integrating signals, communications, field buses, industrial networks, up to the MOM/ MES layer, thus connecting the factory to the ERP system.

We apply our automation model for projects of new plants, expansions of facilities, as well as for technological migrations, version updating and reverse engineering.
Especialidad de la Empresa: AUTOMATION, PROCESS, PLC, SCADA, DCS, BATCH, MES, IT, OSISOFT PI, MOM, AUDIT, ENGINEERING y Industry 4.0

Resumen de la empresa:
Founded in 2015 within the Innovative Enterprises business incubator of the Politecnico di Torino, Enerbrain has developed energy retrofit solutions for large buildings that allow drastic cuts in consumption as well as a significant improvement in internal comfort. Thanks to innovative IoT hardware and powerful algorithms in the cloud to fine-tune energy usage in real time Enerbrain allows operational savings. The main focus goes beyond energy by providing the best indoor air quality and educating occupants in order to generate a wider social impact thanks to engagement tools and a new way to access data across devices.

Compatible with all HVAC systems, Enerbrain system provides the application of plug & play sensors in the building and a device to act to regulate in real time ventilation, heating and cooling based on the reference parameters: outdoor and indoor temperature, relative humidity, CO2 and occupants in the building connected with powerful algorithms.
A smart innovation, which quickly affects the energy management of a building without changes to the existing systems or without drastic structural changes. In most cases it takes two days of installation to cut energy consumption by 30% forever, improving the indoor air quality and the thermal comfort.
The system integrates a unified management through an analytical dashboard, also accessible through an app.
A win-win model for energy efficiency that is rewarded trough the savings in bills and takes on a strategic value for the enhancement of real estate assets.
Sector de la empresa: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI

Resumen de la empresa:
TRE ALTAMIRA is the largest InSAR group worldwide. With over 20 years’ experience, it is globally recognised as the world leader in millimetre-precision ground displacement measurements from satellite radar data, that are used in a variety of sectors, including oil & gas, mining, civil engineering and geohazards monitoring.
 
TRE ALTAMIRA brings together a multidisciplinary team with excellent knowledge of SAR and InSAR applications in different industries, that is the key to its success and growth in both commercial and publicly funded projects.
 
We work together with our clients worldwide, guaranteeing a detailed and personalised approach for each client’s needs. Over the years our expertise has grown to include small to multinational companies as well as governmental institutions.
 
TRE ALTAMIRA is a CLS Group company with main offices in Milano (Italy), Barcelona (Spain) and Vancouver (Canada).

Saphetor SA, is a global precision-medicine company dedicated to large-scale identification and interpretation of human genetic variants by leveraging proprietary algorithms and expert domain knowledge.

Saphetor is the creator of VarSome, a suite of intuitive and data-driven bioinformatics solutions for clinicians and researchers. VarSome is powered by a Molecular DB with over 130 integrated and harmonized genomic data sources, linked by AI to over 32 million publications. Thanks to VarSome’s global community of over 450 000, the database is further enriched by additional unique user-generated annotation. Saphetor has developed proprietary algorithms to automate variant classification based on industry-standard ACMG and AMP guidelines for interpretation of germline and somatic variants, as well as CNVs. 

The VarSome suite offers solutions for individuals needing a powerful Search tool to support research, professional labs requiring a CE-IVD and HIPPA-compliant platform to Analyze NGS samples, and bioinformaticians wanting to use our simple API to access our database and classifiers and integrate into existing Code.

Resumen de la empresa:
Flanks is a Wealth Tech B2B service platform which digitally optimizes your operational efficiency by automating and scaling connections with custodian entities. Created by co-founders Joaquim de la Cruz, Sergi Lao and Álvaro Morales, the firm has come a long way since its beginnings in 2018. 

Using Flanks as a wealth data orchestrator allows financial advisors to connect to any global entity in an automatic way. And therefore, help them aggregate their client’s wealth. By using Flanks’ solution, they get a global position of their client’s operations across all entities, making financial information sharing secure, easy and quick.

In the interconnected world we live in, it is common for clients to have investments, savings and other financial products in different custodian entities. To break this data obstacle, the market offers different solutions to aggregate investment data. Flanks’ scraping technology however, allows to connect to any new custodian entity without having to interact to leverage the consent and credentials. The methodology Flanks uses, known as  “Reverse engineering”, plugs you directly into the core banking of custodian entities. That doesn’t only make the connection more robust, more secure and richer in data (in terms of position and operation of investment products), but is also faster. All of the without suffering possible changes of user interfaces.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Fintech, BaaS, Data Aggregation, Open Banking, Financial Services, API Banking, Big Data, Data Analytics y Reporting

Resumen de la empresa:
Born in 2014 after seeing a massive opportunity for technology to disrupt the multi-trillion SME financing market, AREX is a competitive data-driven fintech company aiming to bridge capital market liquidity and SME cashflow needs.

Our first product is an automated receivables exchange platform where SME invoices are converted into a tradable asset class called Exchange Traded Receivables (ETRs). ETRs are then sold on an open market where a single ETR can be purchased by one or multiple investors using automated trading bots. Most of the ETRs are filled within seconds of being listed.

Unlike our competitors, AREX works exclusively with accounting partners to provide accurate financial pictures of both borrowing firms and their debtors, hence creating a more comprehensive firm’s financial picture while minimizing default risks. Due to this, SMEs typically get lower interest rates while investors get predictable returns with extremely attractive risk/return ratio.

The key to AREX’s success lies in our commitment to building a long rewarding relationship with our partners and SMEs. We listen diligently to understand what our customers need and to service them accordingly. To achieve our Northern Star vision, AREX builds an international team of devoted co-founders and employees, who are everyday committed to empowering SMEs worldwide.

Qualifyze was originally founded under the name ChemSquare during the doctorate at the Technical University Darmstadt in September 2017. The company employs over 100+ employees across offices in Frankfurt and Barcelona, and continues to grow rapidly. Today Qualifyze works on a global, digital network in which customers, suppliers, auditors, subcontractors, and authorities continuously and securely exchange quality data in order to make supply chains more transparent and secure. A global pool of independent and accredited auditors publish their results on the Qualifyze platform, giving companies access to relevant information and quality data from their suppliers without having to carry out extensive audits themselves. Due to the higher reuse of quality data, the total number of supplier audits is reduced, which results in a significant cost reduction for all interest groups in the industry and at the same time increases transparency and security along the value chain.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Digitalization, Audits, Supply Chain, GMP, GxP, Remote Audit, ISO90001, Compliance, Virtual Audits, Audit reports, Pharamaceutical, Shared audits, Joint audits y Auditors

Resumen de la empresa:
EOLOS Floating Lidar Solutions offers a cost-effective, accurate and highly reliable integrated wind measuring system for offshore applications.

Offshore wind farm investments need reliable wind assessments in order to estimate the wind energy potential of the site where the wind turbines will be installed.  Performing wind assessments with no high quality on-site data increases the uncertainty, hindering the project’s bankability and increasing the financial risks of the project. 

EOLOS can help offshore wind developers to significantly reduce capital costs during the development phase, when the final investment decision (FID) has not yet been reached, thus reducing a significant risk since at this stage only a portfolio approach hedges against failure.

The EOLOS LiDAR Buoy is a fully-equipped and autonomous wind, wave and current measuring system based on LIDAR technology and provided with oceanographic instrumentation, which allows to perform measurements at heights of more than 200m over the sea level at much lower costs than conventional bottom-fixed offshore met masts.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Offshore Wind measurements y Floating Lidar

Low-code from data processing to search. Nuclia is an end-to-end and easy- to-use API, able to process any kind of data, to supercharge applications with an AI-powered search engine.

- Out-of-the-box searching semantic & neural search engine
Search by concept, not by keyword. This makes it easier to find exactly what users are looking for. It all saves time and helps uncover knowledge. 100% multilingual.

- Automatic insight detection (named entity recognition)
Nuclia automatically detects and extracts named entities: locations, people, names of products, etc. Nuclia can also be trained to detect your own specific named entities.

- Integrate Nuclia to your own application
Nuclia API let your team to integrate Flaps to empower your applications with a neural & natural language understanding engine

Resumen de la empresa:
Unforgettable experiences at every step.

The most complete ticketing and event technology platform for live events. Dedicated to delivering unforgettable experiences for fans and promoters alike.

About Us:

At Event Genius, we’re dedicated to developing the very best technology in order to deliver unforgettable experiences for event-goers around the world. Our end-to-end technology includes ticketing, access control, travel and packages, marketing, data and insights and cashless payment services.
In 2019, Event Genius (and the associated Ticket Arena consumer website and brand) was acquired by Festicket, the world’s largest platform for discovering and booking festival trips.

Through combining the two companies’ technology offerings, we are now a truly unique end-to-end platform for organisers and fans alike, providing the most complete offering in the live entertainment industry. Through the egTicketing, egCheckout, egMarketing, egTravel, egAccess and egPay solutions, our platform plugs a gap in the market that no other organisation has addressed to date.
We’re proud to have developed partnerships with over 4000 official festival and event partners including Coachella, Tomorrowland, BST Hyde Park, Ibiza Rocks, Untitled Group, Afro Nation, Motion Bristol, Amnesia Ibiza, serving a growing community of over 5 million customers.

Alongside our London HQ, you’ll also found our team all round the world, in Leeds, Los Angeles, Amsterdam, Berlin, Porto, Melbourne and Nantes.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Ticketing Technology, Event Services, RFID Cashless Solutions, Client Service, Online Ticket Sales, Event Management, Access Control, Web Development y App Development

Resumen de la empresa:
Nautilus: Tecnología inalámbrica de flotabilidad neutra para la detección de fugas de agua en tuberías de gran diámetro 

Nautilus consiste en una esfera que viaja en el interior de la tubería impulsada por el caudal del agua. El sonido de una fuga, bolsa de aire o anomalía es grabado por Nautilus y, una vez extraído, los datos se procesan y se indica la localización precisa de las anomalías. 

El Sistema se usa para la detección de fugas, inspección de la red y prevención de fugas. Las compañías de agua obtienen información significativa sobre sus tuberías y enfocan sus acciones para disminuir la inversión en el mantenimiento de sus infraestructuras.

Nautilus provee una solución tecnológica rentable, eficiente y eficaz, con un modelo de uso recurrente que ayuda a minimizar el Agua No Contabilizada en el Mundo.

At Aniling, we are committed to bring advances in the Genomics arena to everyday’s health care and disease prevention. We aim to accelerate the access to scientific advances in genomics and epigenomics by developing technologies with the applicability as prime requirement.
 
Our current work is focused on the improvement of Next Generation Sequencing methods to integrate molecular data into biologically meaning information fulfilling the high quality standards required in clinics.
 
Our company is a spin-off of the Institute of Predictive and Personalized Medicine of Cancer (IMPPC), with full access to shared resources and facilities of the Can Ruti Campus, that includes the Hospital Germans Trias i Pujol, the Autonomous University of Barcelona and six biomedical research institutes (IMPPC, IGTP, IRSICaixa, IJC, Guttmann Institute and ICO).
Especialidad de la Empresa: DNA sequencing, Epigenetics, Genetics y Personalized Medicine

Resumen de la empresa:
s::can is the only company in the world that has given its heart and soul to online water quality measurement. Since our foundation 22 years ago, nothing else has come out of our development department, nothing else has come out of our production sites.

Today our product range covers an absolutely state of the art measuring instrument for each individual parameter for typical applications in the areas of water, waste water, environmental monitoring, and industrial applications. Whether it is a simple pH sensor or a complex spectral probe, s::can measuring instruments are intelligent and compatible with each other in s::can systems and with third-party systems.

Industrial automation is based on detecting the presence, position, or quality of an object, in any production and logistics sector.

To innovate this area and facilitate the transition to industry 4.0, the DATASENSING project was launched, which will combine the Sensor & Safety / Machine Vision Business Unit of Datalogic, a world leader in automatic data acquisition, and M.D. Micro Detectors, a company operating in the design, production, and sale of industrial sensors.

DATASENSING intends to strengthen its presence in industrial automation globally through a complete offering of sensors in various technologies, optoelectronic devices for the safety of machines and production plants, automated vehicle guidance and machine vision for Smart Manufacturing.
Sector de la empresa: Fabricación de electrodomésticos, equipamiento eléctrico y electrónica

Established in 2017 in Barcelona by experienced re/insurance industry professionals, inari has developed leading technology software for the insurance and reinsurance industry. The company provides modern core technology infrastructure for insurers, reinsurers, managing agents, managing general agents (MGAs) and Lloyd’s Syndicates that enables them to increase operational efficiency, improve data insights and streamline connectivity across multiple systems. Inari’s fully managed platforms deliver end-to-end solutions for all insurance and reinsurance risks, as well as provide data-driven insights that help market practitioners better manage their business. 

Inari’s products can be implemented as standalone modular solutions or seamlessly integrated alongside other technology platforms. Inari’s solutions leverage the use of API’s, distributed ledger and cloud-based technologies that enable insurance and reinsurance organisations to concentrate on proactively managing their risks. 

Inari’s clients include major re/insurance industry players, market-leading MGAs, Lloyd’s of London Syndicates and managing agencies, based across the US, London, Bermuda, and Asia. 

For more information, please visit our www.inari.io
Especialidad de la Empresa: Insurance, Insurtech, Blockchain, Risk Management, Predictive Analysis, AI, Business Development, Technology, IT Systems and Development, UX / UI , Visual Design, Underwriting, Cyber Risk, Risk, Actuary, Actuarial, Insuretech, Start Up, Machine Learning y Distributed Ledger

Resumen de la empresa:
ZUMBACH ELECTRONICS is a world-leading manufacturer of in-line measuring systems for industrial applications. We provide the most accurate, reliable, and comprehensive industrial gauging, process control, and quality/production data acquisition technology. With our extensive process and industry knowledge, we offer cost-effective solutions that help manufacturers achieve operational excellence.

ZUMBACH instruments precisely measure diameter, ovality, wall thickness, concentricity, cross section, shape, capacitance, and more. Zumbach also provides fault detection systems, inductive preheaters for metal conductors, spark testers for in-line testing of the dielectric, optical surface inspection systems, in-line profile monitoring systems, data acquisition, and FFT analysis.

Leading manufacturers around the world have integrated Zumbach systems into their processes to increase output, reduce material costs and downtime, improve safety, and control quality. Zumbach systems provide quality improvements in manufacturing through tighter tolerances, better transmission capabilities, and improved workflow

Zumbach’s leadership is built on its expertise in various technologies including lasers/optics, ultrasonic, x-ray, high-voltage technology, computer hardware and software, and more. Numerous international patents and trademarks demonstrate Zumbach’s strength in innovation.
Sector de la empresa: Fabricación de electrodomésticos, equipamiento eléctrico y electrónica

Construimos nuestra cultura de empresa, así como el desarrollo de nuestras soluciones, basándonos en cuatro valores claves: Transparencia, confianza, trabajo en equipo y compromiso.

Resumen de la empresa:
Zokyo is a venture studio that builds, secures, and funds legendary web3/crypto businesses. 

Zokyo's cybersecurity team leverages a real­ world attacker mentality to reduce risk. We have helped build, secure, and deploy blockchain solutions that manage over $30 billion dollars worth of digital assets.

Zokyo provides access to skills ranging from blockchain engineering, blockchain security, token economics, game theory, cryptography, white-hat hacking, mathematical specifications of network design, and QA. 

We take a holistic approach to software development. Our security division leverages a real­ world attacker mentality to reduce risk and fortify code. We protect companies from hackers by offering offensive security services such as security auditing, penetration testing (network, mobile, app), data leak discovery, social engineering, and VAPT testing, etc. 

Zokyo's DeFi studio behaves as a full-stack partner to selected companies providing resources to build, secure, deploy, and grow long-term, sustainable projects, as well as connect to investors and traditional trading firms worldwide.

Our combined knowledge, expertise, and presence in blockchain position us to help businesses identify, mitigate and guard against the risks they, and the community, face in the ever-changing landscape of cybersecurity. 

At Zokyo, we believe we are all stakeholders in the safety and security of blockchain. As stewards of the blockchain ecosystem, we work with the knowledge that reputations are in our hands. 

Headquartered in Las Vegas, NV, with development centers in Ukraine and India, Zokyo travels the globe to connect, share, learn, and grow.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Blockchain , BlockchainSecurity, SmartContractAuditing, PenetrationTesting, BlockchianDevelopment, Softwaredevelopment , MachineLearning, Cryptography , Mobile App Development, Enterprise App Development, ReactJS, ReactNative, NodeJS, Golang, Solidity, Rust, Haskell , Polkadot , Solana, Ethereum , Bitcoin, Cosmos, data science, Digital Assets, VentureStudio, DecentralizedFinance, DeFi, NFT, Web3Social y socialnetworks

L-mobile hace que la recolección de datos sea más fácil, móvil y, por tanto, más transparente y productiva.

Ya sea en el almacén, en la producción o en el servicio, la necesidad de trabajar sin papel y sin interrupciones es cada vez mayor. Como uno de los principales proveedores de software industrial, permitimos un alto nivel de calidad de trabajo, con acceso móvil multiplataforma a través de nuestras soluciones para la logística de almacenes, la producción digitalizada o la gestión de servicios digitales. Factores como el ahorro de costes y tiempo, así como la recolección y conservación de datos operacionales, son una base fundamental para cualquier operación moderna. 

Con nuestras soluciones de adquisición de datos y sistemas independientes del ERP, que pueden integrarse de forma óptima en su entorno de TI existente, estará en el buen camino hacia la fábrica inteligente. Los datos sensibles permanecen en el propio sistema de su empresa: usted decide en todo momento el grado de transparencia de su entorno de trabajo. 

Quieres saber mas?. Contactanos!

UniversalDoctor is a social enterprise co-creating digital solutions for global health.

We started out with developing our own suite of award-winning multilingual medical translation tools to bridge language gaps in healthcare. Over the past decade we've worked with a variety of actors in the public health space to build customized multilingual medical translation tools.
 
We have since expanded our scope to collaborating with governments, hospitals, private sector, and multilateral international agencies such as the World Health Organization (WHO) to co-create innovative digital global health solutions, ranging from national-level mobile data collection to clinical decision support tools and much more.

Resumen de la empresa:
PricingHUB's mission is to help retailers  and e-commerce players protect their margins by putting customers’ price sensitivity (not competition) at the center of the price optimisation decision. 

We leverage internal data and AI to deliver actionable price recommendations to optimize trading objectives while providing a clear ROI information.

Our goal is twofold: i. Help our clients understand price elasticity and its components at a granular level and ii. Bring in automation so they can run pricing optimization at scale. 

At PricingHUB we do also believe that there is a big opportunity to leverage on line data to make better pricing decisions in store.

We focus on working on specific use cases (such as but not limited to) ...
- Clustering your product portfolio to implement differentiated product strategies
- Price dynamically the most cross-sold products, 
- Optimizing your promotion strategy 
- Manage your longtail 

... And develop the methods, tools and algorithms that will serve those use case. 

If you are curious to understand how it works, please contact us: info@pricinghub.net
If you are a Data Scientist or a Dev looking for a very data centric and solid start-up project check our offers https://www.pricinghub.net/jobs-2/
Especialidad de la Empresa: Dynamic Pricing , SaaS, Machine Learning, e-Commerce, Retail, Price Elasticity, Revenue Management y AI

Resumen de la empresa:
Our story began with a simple goal: 
Help companies save money by eliminating their energy inefficiencies and by that give our contribution towards a more sustainable world. 
It is a Win-Win. Win for You and for the Planet.

The Predictive Company’s solution is an Energy Management System based on Artificial Intelligence. 
The solution consists of a personalized energy optimization & an autonomous machinery control allowing savings in energy and CO2 emissions up to 30%.
It can be implemented in any type of a building in the tertiary sector (school, offices, museums…)

The novelty of The Predictive Company’s software is based on
- the usage of self-learning algorithms to determine the optimal operation of the energetic infrastructure and 
- the addition of unlimited number of variables allowing to create a more precise prediction of the energy need, which will lead to a higher level of savings.

More than a decade of the research and development allows us to put the exact necessary weight on the different variables, which allows the software to create a prediction of the energy need with a precision rate higher than 95%.

Check out our website for more details on the technology and follow us to stay updated.

--------------
In Collaboration with Polytechnic of Catalunya & Motion Control and Industrial Applications Center (MCIA)

Supported by: Climate-KIC & Mobile World Capital

Resumen de la empresa:
SERFIEX S.A. es una empresa española especialista en soluciones de valoración de activos financieros y pasivos actuariales, risk-management y cumplimiento normativo para cuatro áreas financieras: aseguradoras, gestoras de inversiones, bolsas y bancos. Desde 1993. SERFIEX es una empresa Risktech, Insurtech, Regtech y Fintech.

SERFIEX licencia su software RISKCO y presta con él servicios de valor añadido a clientes institucionales. RISKCO combina conocimiento académico avanzado y 25 años de experiencia. La velocidad, versatilidad y funcionalidad de RISKCO es comparable a FIS-Prophet o WillisTowersWatson-RiskAgility para cálculos actuariales; y a Algorithmics o Aladdin para cálculos financieros.

Los precios actuales de RISKCO y de sus servicios asociados son muy inferiores a los de los líderes internacionales y nuestra calidad es excelente.

RISKCO está presente en cerca de 100 instituciones financieras. Más de 50 aseguradoras, más de 30 gestoras de inversiones, bancos y bolsas en España, Portugal, Colombia, México, Chile y Perú.

Hemos realizado proyectos de consultoría internacionales para el Banco Mundial (mercado de bonos corporativos en Tailandia), la Unión Europea (desarrollo del mercado de deuda pública en Ucrania) y Ministerio de Economía de Perú (gestión de deuda pública peruana).
 
Desde sus inicios SERFIEX siempre ha sido una compañía adelantada a su tiempo. Hemos desarrollado productos y conceptos nuevos:

SERFIEX fue uno de los mayores contribuidores internacionales a REUTERS y BLOOMBERG a finales de los 90: Índices Demi (los primeros índices de renta fija en el mundo “fair value” y en tiempo real), curvas cupón cero, matrices de riesgo previstas y predicciones de volatilidad.
SERFIEX desarrollo en 1999 uno de los primeros “robo-advisor” de la industria financiera internacional: con el nombre “Asesor Virtual”, para los bancos UNO-E y Activo Bank.

Mediante la creación de un modelo personalizado con Inteligencia Artificial, somos capaces de medir el impacto real de tu marca en cualquier deporte, en cualquier soporte y en cualquier emisión multimedia. 

Camaleonic Analytics se convierte en vuestro partner estratégico para analizar, medir y evaluar vuestro ROI obtenido en vuestras inversiones en patrocinio. 

Solo conociendo toda la información es posible tomar mejores decisiones. 

Conoce. Compara. Optimiza.

Resumen de la empresa:
Still wasting time and money computing what your brain cannot distinguish? 
Qbeast is a Big Data cloud platform which takes a “Cubistic approach” on Big Data. It helps Data Scientists and Data Engineers get the results needed, accessing only a fraction of the data.  

Thanks to an innovative data storage technology that combines multidimensional indexing and sampling techniques, Qbeast “the storage accelerator” organizes and manages data matching the way our brains consume it. 

The platform produces the same insights, without processing massive amounts of data in the Cloud. Powering AI with only accessing a small fraction of available data. This is what we call Data Leverage. Organizations can remove the unnecessary by adjusting the precision of data analytics to analyze data interactively and up to 100 times faster. 

Or as we like to say “Big Data Free From The Unnecessary”.

Qbeast was founded in 2020 by a data ready international team and the technology is the result of years of research at the Barcelona Supercomputing Center. Early collaborations around Big Data and machine learning with data-driven industry players such as “la Caixa”, “FCA” and “Telefonica” helped us move rapidly towards market readiness.. 
  
Seeking partnerships and investment opportunities.

VC-backed

UTPR®, fundada en 1994, presta servicios en toda España a centros sanitarios (odontológicos, veterinarios, geriátricos, médicos y hospitalarios) y de belleza (peluquerías, salones de tatuaje, y más).

Deerns est un bureau d’études international et indépendant, spécialisé dans l’ingénierie de fluides, dans la stratégie environnementale et énergétique, dans la performance durable des bâtiments, ainsi que dans la conception de systèmes intelligents et communicants. Nos équipes conçoivent des bâtiments en 5 secteurs spécifiques: 1) Aéroports, 2) Data-Centres, 3) Etablissements Hospitaliers, 4) Laboratoires et Salles Propres et 5) Tertiaire Commercial. Créé en 1928, Deerns a des bureaux implantés en 8 pays et projets développés dans environ 60 pays. Fort de ses 500 collaborateurs à haute compétence technique, Deerns fournit des services d’ingénierie avec une approche intégrée, allant de la conception de systèmes mécaniques, électriques et hydrauliques, de réseaux et installations intelligentes, de transport vertical, d'ingénierie des façades, de santé et sécurité du cadre bâti, jusqu'au contrôle et commande de systèmes, et à l'accompagnement aux certifications de bâtiments (HQE, BREEAM, LEED, WELL, Effinergie, R2S, WiredScore). Deerns France a été créé en 2010.

Resumen de la empresa:
We are a data-driven agency specialising in Social Media Intelligence, with projects spanning across countries, cultures and sectors. Through the use of Social Media monitoring, Big Data Analytics and O.S.I.N.T tools supported by image recognition, meme OCR and NLP analysis, we are able to not only just identify the relevant and then pertinent data, but also to provide our clients with the bigger picture. 

The powerful technology that does this is called Metatron Analytics - a tool created and developed by Water On Mars. It can access interactive reports, which are updated daily and identify the main players and the data connected to information disorder operations in all its forms: social media posts, news, memes, videos and forums, that helps viralise content tracked back to specific sources through the main channels as well as less-traditional ones such as Bitchute, GAB, Telegram and VK.

Дримсим — международная компания со штаб-квартирой в Испании. В 2016 году мы создали универсальную сим-карту для путешественников и бесплатное приложение для управления сим-картой. 

Что мы делаем

Наша миссия — дать путешественникам свободу от забот о связи в любой стране мира. С сим-картой Дримсим можно быть на связи, когда самолёт ещё только садится, она сама подключится к оператору. Никакой абонплаты и пакетов, только плата за фактическое использование трафика, сообщений и звонков.

Почему люди выбирают нас

* Мы предлагаем людям удобный и прозрачный продукт и поддерживаем принцип открытости и внутри компании.

* Сим-карта Дримсим работает в 197 странах мира, и мы постепенно расширяем этот список.

* Официальные представители компании — в Испании, России, Украине, Израиле.

* Партнерская сеть операторов Дримсим — более 400 надежных компаний, среди которых Vodafone, AT&T, MTX Connnect, China Mobile.

Наша команда

В Дримсим работает распределённая команда с интернациональным составом. Все наши сотрудники общаются в общей рабочей среде и могут обратиться с идеями напрямую к генеральному директору.

Дримсим развивается и растёт, и у каждого в команде тоже есть возможность расти.

Присоединяйтесь к команде мечты! Будем менять мир к лучшему.
We have offices in Barcelona (Spain) and Basel (Switzerland). In general, team members are welcome to work from home a few days per week. We do NOT hire off-site workers.

cbs Transformation Consulting España fue fundada en 2017 como una empresa vinculada a cbs Corporate Business Solutions GmbH (est. 1995).
cbs crea soluciones para cualquier tipo de industria y grandes multinacionales. 
Aprovechamos nuestra experiencia líder en el mercado para garantizar que la transformación digital y la globalización se integren con éxito en el espacio SAP.
En cbs Transformation Consulting ayudamos a nuestros clientes a optimizar el entorno de sus sistemas y a gestionar sus activos más críticos: los datos.
La cartera de transformación digital integral de la compañía es única. Con cbs Enterprise Transformer para SAP S/4HANA®, cbs ofrece el primer software standard del mundo completamente integrado en SAP, permitiendo así que Enterprise Transformer sea la mejor base para lanzar la transición digital al nuevo mundo de SAP.
cbs Corporate Business Solutions GmbH fue fundada el 1995 en Alemania. Con un recorrido sostenible y de éxito, en 2017 cbs generó una facturación de más de 80 millones de Euros. Desde 2009 nuestra facturación se ha cuadruplicado y más que doblado en los últimos cuatro años. La base de nuestro éxito es el saber mantener relaciones de larga duración con nuestros clientes. Más de 300 empresas de gran éxito depositan su confianza en cbs. 
Con cerca de 1000 especialistas en SAP, cbs tiene su sede central en Heidelberg y sus sedes en Munich, Stuttgart, Dormund, Hamburg, Barcelona, Philadelphia, Singapore, Kuala Lumpur y Zurich. Mediante su fuerte red internacional de colaboradores, cbs enfoca proyectos a gran escala y provee soluciones adaptadas al cliente en todo el mundo.
Operamos independientemente en el mercado como la consultora y experta en SAP del Grupo Materna.
Especialidad de la Empresa: SAP System Landscape Transformation, SAP S/4HANA, SAP S/4HANA Transition, Global SAP Rollout Programs, Corporate SAP Templates, SAP Master Data Management, Yard Suite und SAP Yard Management

Resumen de la empresa:
Desde su creación en Barcelona en 2010, Market Control ha desarrollado una gran experiencia en la implementación y soporte de sistemas de optimización de ventas.

Nuestro software para optimización de los equipos de ventas permite a nuestros clientes alcanzar una óptima cobertura de mercado y mejorar la transparencia del trabajo de sus equipos de ventas.

Proporcionamos al cliente una plataforma online para gestionar todas las funciones y actividades, facilitando la colaboración entre los miembros del equipo de campo y de oficina. Nos adaptamos a la estrategia e identidad corporativas, diseñando nuestra plataforma de acuerdo con las necesidades expresadas por el cliente. Nuestro software es fácil de configurar y muy flexible con las adaptaciones requeridas.

Nuestro software ofrece mucho más que un CRM o ERP, ya que permite optimizar el trabajo desde la base (toma de datos en el punto de venta), una gestión de rutas automatizada, hasta el soporte digital al equipo de ventas. Miles de líneas datos son automáticamente procesados para convertirse en información tratable, dando opciones de análisis interactivo y creación de previsiones. Esto mejora la toma de decisiones desde Back Office y el desempeño de objetivos en el Sales Team.

Con nuestros servicios, los clientes reducen sus costes y aumentan productividad, ahorrando al equipo de ventas burocracia y gestiones intermedias.

A lo largo de los años, nos hemos ganado la confianza de empresas líderes de mercado, como Affinity Petcare, Brita, IFAK Institut y Nutrition et Santé.

Resumen de la empresa:
Nacidos como resultado de 25 años de experiencia en video-vigilancia, nos centramos los últimos 13 años en soluciones de tráfico para las ciudades y las necesidades de la policía. Nuestro objetivo es la seguridad pública y el tráfico, y nuestro propósito es un mundo más seguro e inteligente. Pero esto no es todo, ¿puedes imaginar el valor añadido que podríamos dar a cada dato estadístico de tráfico en cada zona de la ciudad?

Hemos revolucionado la forma de trabajar de los cuerpos policiales con herramientas tecnológicas que aportan proactividad y mejoran la toma de decisiones. La investigación profunda y las herramientas de colaboración los hacen más eficientes. Hemos ayudado a transformar la seguridad pública en un motor de cambio trasversal para las ciudades.

Nuestro trabajo cercano con las ciudades y las fuerzas policiales, nuestro compromiso de calidad y nuestra implicación en la consecución de resultados han convertido a nuestros clientes en nuestros mejores prescriptores.

Con proyectos en curso en más de 140 ciudades, somos especialistas en dar respuestas adaptadas a las necesidades de las ciudades.

Como fabricantes y desarrolladores, exportamos nuestras soluciones a todo el mundo para ampliar nuestras innovaciones como resultado de nuestra experiencia.
Especialidad de la Empresa: Public Safety, Public Security, Road Safety, Traffic, Mobility, ALPR, LPR, License plate reading solutions, Security and Mobility solutions, Crimes prevention solutions, Time police work optimization, Smart Cities, Data management solutions, Public Administration provider, Technology, Software Development, R&D, Law Enforcement Sales y Research and Development

Resumen de la empresa:
About Doole
Doole is a platform for medical virtual visits that strengthens the link between patients and health professionals, providing added value to the patients while optimizing resources in terms of time, costs and distance at both ends as well as allowing access to new segments of care as well as outpatients.

An App powered by Doole is user friendly, versatile and adaptable. For patients it works as an App for Android and iOS, where they can have access to all their health related information, including medication, reminders, individualized recommendations for specific pathologies as well as medical reports, analysis or tests results, and directly interact with their health care providers. From the health centre perspective, Doole enables the center to store in one place all information related to a patient and the data is managed from a backoffice accessible from any internet browser and from a specific App. Additionally, Doole can be used in environments with limited bandwidth.

We live, work and interact in a physical space. We believe that by understanding how we use and behave in each space we will take better decisions to build better spaces.

For ESPACIA transforming surfaces into a digital platform is just the starting point. As a digital platform, we create valueby adding as much touchpoints as possible, either from our own sensors or other sources. By offering simple and easy solutions based on data from space usage, we can have an impact in the whole journey of the user, before and after they step into a specific area. To do so, we work by offering: 

• espacia Mat: Unique pressure mapping sensor, capable of counting with a +98% precission and ensuring total privacy. 
• espacia Cloud: SaaS platform that allows users to access their space in real-time to understand, compare, and export key insights from thir own data.

Our philosophy is based on continuous improvement, looking for ways to offer not a one-time insight but long-term value.
Sector de la empresa: Servicios de TI y consultoría de TI
